llm_td_lst.title: Home Security Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart home security system that allows arming and disarming in various modes, with MQTT-based control over alarm states.

alarmState.title: Alarm State
alarmState.description: The current state of the alarm system, which can be disarmed, armed in various modes, pending, or triggered.

alarmControlAction.title: Alarm Control
alarmControlAction.description: An action to control the alarm system with different arming modes and disarming.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Home Security System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart home security system that allows users to arm and disarm their alarm, as well as monitor its current state through various modes including away, home, night, vacation, pending, or triggered.

alarmState.title: Alarm State
alarmState.description: Represents the current state of the alarm system, which can be disarmed, armed in various modes (home, away, night, vacation), pending, or triggered.

setAlarmState.title: Set Alarm State
setAlarmState.description: An action to change the state of the alarm system. The possible states are DISARM, ARM_HOME, ARM_AWAY, ARM_NIGHT, ARM_VACATION, and ARM_CUSTOM_BYPASS.

llm_td_lst.title: Home Security Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A home security alarm system that supports various arming modes and can be controlled remotely through MQTT protocol.

alarmStatus.title: Alarm Status
alarmStatus.description: Represents the current state of the alarm system, including various armed states and trigger status.

alarmSystemControl.title: Alarm System Control
alarmSystemControl.description: An action to control the alarm system's state, allowing users to arm or disarm the system in various modes.

llm_td_lst.title: Alarm System Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm system that can be armed or disarmed in various modes, and provides current state information through MQTT communication.

alarmState.title: Alarm State
alarmState.description: Represents the current state of the alarm system, which can be in various modes such as disarmed, armed home, armed away, etc.

alarmArmAction.title: Alarm Arm/Disarm Action
alarmArmAction.description: An action to arm or disarm the alarm system with different modes.

llm_td_lst.title: Home Security Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A security alarm system that provides various arming modes and can be triggered when security is breached. The system allows for remote monitoring and control through MQTT communication.

alarmState.title: Alarm State
alarmState.description: Represents the current state of the alarm system, which can be one of several predefined values including disarmed, armed in various modes, pending, or triggered.

alarmSetAction.title: Alarm Set Action
alarmSetAction.description: An action to set the alarm state in different modes (DISARM, ARM_HOME, ARM_AWAY, ARM_NIGHT, ARM_VACATION, ARM_CUSTOM_BYPASS)

llm_td_lst.title: Window Contact Sensor Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart window contact sensor that monitors the state of a window (open/closed) and reports its availability status.

windowContactState.description: The current state of the window contact sensor, indicating whether the window is open, closed, or in an unknown state.

windowAvailability.title: Window Availability
windowAvailability.description: Indicates whether the window device is currently available or not. This availability status can be used to determine if the device is operational.

llm_td_lst.description: A window contact sensor that monitors the state of a window (open/closed) and its availability status.

windowAvailabilityStatus.title: Window Availability
windowAvailabilityStatus.description: Represents the availability status of the window sensor. It indicates whether the device is currently reachable or not.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Switch Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart switch device that can be controlled remotely and provides status updates about its availability. It includes a button press event notification feature.

availabilityStatus.title: Availability Status
availabilityStatus.description: Represents the availability status of the switch device, indicating whether it is currently connected and operational or not.

switchPressed.title: Switch Pressed Event
switchPressed.description: Event that signals when the switch has been pressed.

llm_td_lst.title: Switch Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart switch device that can be monitored and controlled remotely, providing availability status and press events.

switchAvailability.title: Switch Availability
switchAvailability.description: Indicates whether the switch is currently available or not. This property reflects the device's current availability status.

switchPressedEvent.title: Switch Pressed Event
switchPressedEvent.description: An event indicating that the switch has been pressed. The payload being null suggests it's just a trigger notification without additional data.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Switch Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart switch device that can be monitored and controlled. It provides availability status updates and generates events when pressed.

switchAvailabilityStatus.title: Switch Availability
switchAvailabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the switch device is currently available or not. The availability status changes between 'available' and 'unavailable'.

switchPressed.title: Switch Press Event
switchPressed.description: An event that indicates when the switch has been pressed.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Switch Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart switch device that can be controlled remotely and provides status updates about its availability and button press events.

switchAvailability.title: Switch Availability
switchAvailability.description: Indicates whether the switch device is currently connected and responding to commands.

switchPressedEvent.title: Switch Pressed Event
switchPressedEvent.description: An event that indicates the switch has been pressed. The payload being null suggests it's just a notification without additional data.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Switch Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart switch device that can be controlled remotely and provides status updates about its availability. The device includes features such as button press detection and MQTT communication for real-time notifications.

switchAvailability.title: Switch Availability
switchAvailability.description: Indicates whether the switch is currently connected and operational or not. It can have two states: 'available' or 'unavailable'. This is a property that reflects the current status of the device.

buttonPressed.title: Button Pressed Event
buttonPressed.description: Event triggered when the button is pressed. The event is sent multiple times with null payload, indicating it's an event notification rather than a state change.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Doorbell Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart doorbell device that provides availability status and ring event notifications through MQTT messaging protocol.

doorbellAvailabilityStatus.title: Doorbell Availability Status
doorbellAvailabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the doorbell device is currently online or offline. The status can be either 'ONLINE' or 'OFFLINE', which are retained messages.

doorbellRingEvent.title: Doorbell Ring Event
doorbellRingEvent.description: An event that represents the doorbell being pressed, with a timestamp in Unix epoch format.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Doorbell Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart doorbell that monitors its online status and records the timestamp of when it is rung.

deviceAvailabilityStatus.title: Device Availability Status
deviceAvailabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the device is currently online or offline, allowing consumers to monitor its connection state.

doorbellRingTimestamp.title: Doorbell Ring Timestamp
doorbellRingTimestamp.description: Records the timestamp when the doorbell was rung. This appears to be an event as it captures a specific moment in time when an action occurred.

llm_td_lst.title: Doorbell Device with Availability Status
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a doorbell device that tracks ring counts and reports availability status. It uses MQTT protocol for communication.

availabilityStatus.title: Availability Status
availabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the device is currently available or not. The status can be either ONLINE or OFFLINE.

doorbellRingCounter.title: Doorbell Ring Counter
doorbellRingCounter.description: This affordance represents the doorbell ring counter, which tracks the number of times the doorbell has been pressed over time.

llm_td_lst.title: Doorbell Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart doorbell that reports its availability status and sends ring events with timestamps

deviceAvailabilityStatus.title: Device Availability Status
deviceAvailabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the device is currently online or offline. This property reflects the current connectivity state of the device.

ringEvent.title: Ring Event
ringEvent.description: The device sends a ring event with a timestamp value.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Doorbell Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart doorbell that monitors and reports its availability status online/offline, and publishes timestamps when the doorbell is pressed.

deviceAvailabilityStatus.title: Device Availability
deviceAvailabilityStatus.description: Indicates whether the device is currently online or offline. This property reflects the current connection status of the IoT device.

doorBellRingTimestamp.title: Ring Timestamp
doorBellRingTimestamp.description: A timestamp indicating when the doorbell was pressed, published as an event

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle Charging System
llm_td_lst.description: A comprehensive system that monitors and controls the charging process of an electric vehicle, including battery status, energy consumption, range estimation, and charging limits.

chargeStatus.title: Charge Status
chargeStatus.description: The current charge status of the EV, represented as an enum string value (A-F)

soc.title: State Of Charge
soc.description: Represents the current state of charge (SOC) of an electric vehicle as a percentage value.

chargedEnergy.title: Charged Energy
chargedEnergy.description: The amount of energy that has been charged into the EV battery.

batteryCapacity.title: Battery Capacity
batteryCapacity.description: The capacity of the electric vehicle's battery in kWh.

evRange.title: Electric Vehicle Range
evRange.description: The current range of the electric vehicle in kilometers or miles, depending on region settings.

evOdometerReading.title: Odometer Reading
evOdometerReading.description: The odometer reading represents the total distance traveled by the electric vehicle.

chargerPower.title: Charger Power
chargerPower.description: The current power consumption or production of the EV charger in watts.

chargingLimit.title: Charging Limit

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle Charger
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electric vehicle charger that monitors and controls charging operations, including status monitoring, current levels across three phases, power consumption measurement, enable/disable functionality, and maximum current setting adjustment.

chargerStatus.title: Charger Status
chargerStatus.description: Represents the current status of the EV charger, which can take on one of several discrete string values (A through F). This appears to be an observable property that reports the operational state of the charging system.

currentLevels.title: Current Levels
currentLevels.description: The current levels measured across the three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the EV charger.

chargerPowerConsumption.title: Power consumption measurement
chargerPowerConsumption.description: The current power consumption of the EV charger in watts, measured as a numeric value.

isChargerEnabled.title: Charger Enabled Status
isChargerEnabled.description: Indicates whether the EV charger is currently enabled or disabled

maxCurrentSetting.title: Maximum Current Setting
maxCurrentSetting.description: The maximum current setting for the EV charger, which can be adjusted to limit the charging power.

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle Charger
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electric vehicle charger with real-time monitoring capabilities and remote control features

evChargerStatus.title: EV Charger Status
evChargerStatus.description: The current status of the EV charger, which can take on one of several predefined string values.

chargerCurrent.title: Current Measurement
chargerCurrent.description: Measures the current flowing through each phase (L1, L2, L3) in real-time.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: The current power level in watts being drawn or supplied by the EV charger.

chargerEnabledStatus.title: Charger Enabled Status
chargerEnabledStatus.description: Indicates whether the EV charger is currently enabled or disabled.

maxCurrent.title: Maximum Current Setting
maxCurrent.description: The maximum current setting for the charger in amperes.

garageChargerEnableAction.title: Enable Charger
garageChargerEnableAction.description: An action to enable or disable the EV charger in the garage.

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle Charger
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electric vehicle charger that monitors and controls charging operations, including status, current measurements, power levels, and enable/disable functionality.

chargerStatus.title: Charger Status
chargerStatus.description: The current status of the EV charger, represented as a single letter (A-F). This property reflects the operational state of the charging system.

chargerCurrentMeasurement.title: Current measurement values for the EV charger
chargerCurrentMeasurement.description: This affordance provides current measurements across three phases (L1, L2, L3) from the electric vehicle charger.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: The current power consumption or production level of the EV charger in watts.

chargerEnabledStatus.title: Charger Enabled Status
chargerEnabledStatus.description: Indicates whether the EV charger is currently enabled or disabled. The value can be either true (enabled) or false (disabled). This property reflects the current state of the charger.

maxCurrentSetting.title: Maximum Current Setting
maxCurrentSetting.description: The maximum current that the charger can deliver to the EV.

enableCharger.title: Enable Charger
enableCharger.description: Enables or disables the EV charger. This action controls whether the charger is active and can charge vehicles.

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle (EV) Charger
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models an Electric Vehicle (EV) charger, which provides real-time monitoring of charging status, current readings, power levels, and enables control over the charger's operation.

chargerStatus.title: Charger Status
chargerStatus.description: The current status of the EV charger, represented by a single character (A-F)

currentReading.title: Current Reading
currentReading.description: The current flowing through the three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the EV charger.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: The current power level measurement from the EV charger in watts.

chargerEnabledStatus.title: Charger Enabled Status
chargerEnabledStatus.description: Indicates whether the EV charger is enabled or not. This property can be read to get the current status and written to enable/disable the charger.

maxCurrentSetting.title: Maximum Current Setting
maxCurrentSetting.description: The maximum current that can be drawn by the charger, measured in amperes.

enableCharger.title: Enable Charger
enableCharger.description: Enables or disables the charger, allowing control over its operation.

llm_td_lst.title: Electric Vehicle (EV) Charger
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electric vehicle charger that provides real-time monitoring of charging status, current readings across three phases, power level, and enables remote control of the charging functionality.

chargerStatus.title: Charger Status
chargerStatus.description: The current status of the EV charger, represented as an ENUM string value.

currentReadings.title: Current readings for EV charger
currentReadings.description: This affordance represents the current measurements from three phases (L1, L2, L3) in an electric vehicle charger. The values are reported as floating-point numbers.

powerLevel.title: Power Level
powerLevel.description: The current power level of the EV charger in watts.

isChargerEnabled.title: EV Charger Enabled Status
isChargerEnabled.description: Indicates whether the EV charger is currently enabled or disabled.

maxCurrentSetting.title: Maximum Current Setting
maxCurrentSetting.description: The maximum current setting for the EV charger, measured in amperes. This property allows reading and writing the maximum current limit.

chargerEnable.title: Enable Charger
chargerEnable.description: Enables or disables the charger. When enabled, the charger can charge the vehicle.

base_td.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan
base_td.description: A ceiling fan with different modes

oscillationState.title: Oscillation State
oscillationState.description: Indicates if the fan is oscillating or not

staling.title: Fan Staling
staling.description: This event is triggered when the fan has stalled

setMode.title: Fan Mode
setMode.description: Set the fan mode: auto, smart, woosh, eco, night or breeze

setSpeed.title: Fan speed
setSpeed.description: Set the fan speed in percent

llm_td_lst.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan
llm_td_lst.description: A ceiling fan in the bedroom with controllable features like speed, oscillation, and operational modes.

statusOfBedroomFan.title: Status of the ceiling fan in the bedroom
statusOfBedroomFan.description: This affordance represents the current status of the ceiling fan, indicating whether it is turned on or off. It can have three possible values: UNKNOWN, ON, and OFF.

oscillationControl.title: Oscillation Control
oscillationControl.description: This affordance controls whether the fan oscillates or not. It switches between true and false values.

stalingStatus.title: Staling Status
stalingStatus.description: The device reports its operational status, either 'STALED' or 'OPERATIONAL'. This indicates whether the device is currently functioning properly.

setMode.title: Fan Mode Setting
setMode.description: This affordance allows setting the operational mode of the ceiling fan. It accepts string values representing different modes such as auto, smart, woosh, eco, night, and breeze.

setSpeed.title: Set Speed
setSpeed.description: This affordance allows the user to set the speed of the ceiling fan in the bedroom.

llm_td_lst.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan
llm_td_lst.description: A ceiling fan in the bedroom with controllable modes, speed, and status monitoring capabilities.

status.title: Fan Status
status.description: The current operational state of the ceiling fan (UNKNOWN, ON, or OFF)

oscillationStatus.title: Oscillation Status
oscillationStatus.description: Indicates whether the fan's oscillation feature is enabled or disabled.

stalingStatus.title: Staling Status
stalingStatus.description: Indicates whether the fan is staled or operational. This status can be used to monitor if the fan needs maintenance.

setFanMode.title: Set Fan Mode
setFanMode.description: An action to set the operating mode of the ceiling fan. The available modes are auto, smart, woosh, eco, night, and breeze.

setFanSpeed.title: Set Fan Speed
setFanSpeed.description: Sets the speed of the ceiling fan in the bedroom.

llm_td_lst.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan
llm_td_lst.description: A smart ceiling fan located in the bedroom, capable of controlling various features such as speed, oscillation, and operational modes. The device provides status updates on its operation and can be controlled through MQTT communication.

fanStatus.title: Fan Status
fanStatus.description: The operational status of the ceiling fan, indicating whether it is currently running or not.

oscillationControl.title: Ceiling Fan Oscillation
oscillationControl.description: Affordance to control the oscillation feature of the ceiling fan in the bedroom. It allows turning the oscillation on or off.

stalingStatus.title: Staling Status
stalingStatus.description: Indicates whether the fan has stalled or is operating normally. Values are 'STALED' or 'OPERATIONAL'.

setModeAffordance.title: Mode Setting Affordance
setModeAffordance.description: This affordance allows the user to set different modes for the ceiling fan, such as auto, smart, woosh, eco, night, and breeze. Each mode likely corresponds to a specific operating configuration of the fan.

setSpeed.title: Set Fan Speed
setSpeed.description: This affordance allows the user to set the speed of the ceiling fan in the bedroom.

llm_td_lst.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart ceiling fan controller that allows setting the operational mode, speed, and monitoring various states such as oscillation, staling, and status.

fanStatus.title: Fan Status
fanStatus.description: Describes the current operational state of the ceiling fan.

oscillationState.title: Oscillation Property
oscillationState.description: Represents the oscillation state of the ceiling fan, indicating whether it is rotating or stationary.

stalingStatus.title: Staling Status
stalingStatus.description: The staling status indicates whether the fan is operational or has stalled.

setMode.title: Ceiling Fan Mode Setting
setMode.description: This affordance allows setting the operational mode of the ceiling fan.

setFanSpeed.title: Set Fan Speed
setFanSpeed.description: This affordance allows the user to set the speed of the ceiling fan in the bedroom.

llm_td_lst.title: Bedroom Ceiling Fan
llm_td_lst.description: A smart ceiling fan with controllable features including on/off status, oscillation mode, staling detection, multiple operational modes (eco, auto, breeze, night, woosh, smart), and adjustable speed settings.

ceilStatus.title: Ceiling Fan Status
ceilStatus.description: The current operational status of the ceiling fan, indicating whether it's turned on or off.

oscillationStatus.title: Oscillation Status
oscillationStatus.description: Represents the oscillation status of the ceiling fan, indicating whether the fan blades are moving in a rotating pattern or not.

stalingStatus.title: Staling Status
stalingStatus.description: Indicates whether the fan's staling status is operational or not. This can be used to determine if the fan needs maintenance.

setMode.title: Set Fan Mode
setMode.description: An action that allows setting the mode of operation for the ceiling fan.

setFanSpeed.title: Set Fan Speed
setFanSpeed.description: This affordance allows setting the fan speed to a specific value.

base_td.title: Air Humidifier
base_td.description: An air humidifier with multiple modes

targetReached.title: Target Reached
targetReached.description: The humidity target has been reached

data.title: Timestamp

belowThreshold.title: Below Threshold

data.title: Timestamp

setThreshold.title: Threshold Humidity
setThreshold.description: Set the humidity threshold target in percent

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode
setMode.description: Set the mode of the humidifier

setState.title: Humidifier On/Off-State
setState.description: Turn the humidifier on or off

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Humidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart home humidification device that controls and monitors indoor humidity levels, with various operating modes and alert features.

humidifierStatus.title: Humidifier Status
humidifierStatus.description: The current operational status of the humidifier. Possible values include ON, OFF, IDLE, and UNKNOWN.

humidityLevel.title: Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: Current humidity level in the room as measured by the humidifier

targetOkTimestamp.title: Target OK Timestamp
targetOkTimestamp.description: This is an event that indicates when the humidifier has reached its target humidity level. The timestamp represents the Unix epoch time (seconds since January 1, 1970) when the target was achieved.

thresholdBelowAlert.title: Humidity Threshold Below Alert
thresholdBelowAlert.description: An event that triggers when the humidity level falls below a certain threshold. The timestamp indicates when the alert occurred.

targetHumiditySet.title: Target Humidity Setting
targetHumiditySet.description: This action allows setting the target humidity level for the humidifier. The values are numeric and represent percentage points.

thresholdSet.title: Threshold Set
thresholdSet.description: This affordance allows setting the threshold value for the humidifier. It appears to be an action since it involves changing a state on the device.

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode Setting
setMode.description: This affordance allows setting different operating modes for the humidifier. The possible modes are normal, eco, away, boost, comfort, home, sleep, auto, and baby.

setState.title: Humidifier State Control
setState.description: This affordance allows the user to turn the humidifier on or off.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Humidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart humidifier device that can control humidity levels in a room, with various operational modes and settings.

humidifierStatus.title: Humidifier Status
humidifierStatus.description: The current operational state of the humidifier. Possible values are UNKNOWN, ON, OFF, and IDLE.

currentHumidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
currentHumidityLevel.description: This property represents the current humidity level in the room where the humidifier is located. It provides real-time readings of the relative humidity percentage.

targetOkTime.title: Target OK Time
targetOkTime.description: The timestamp when the target humidity was reached successfully.

humidityThresholdBelowEvent.title: Humidity Threshold Below Event
humidityThresholdBelowEvent.description: Event triggered when the humidity falls below a certain threshold. The timestamp indicates when the event occurred.

targetHumiditySetpoint.title: Target Humidity Setpoint
targetHumiditySetpoint.description: Sets the desired humidity level for the humidifier to maintain. The value represents a percentage.

thresholdSet.title: Humidity Threshold Setting
thresholdSet.description: This affordance allows setting the humidity threshold for the humidifier. It accepts integer values representing different humidity levels.

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode
setMode.description: Sets the operational mode of the humidifier. This can be one of several predefined modes such as normal, eco, away, boost, comfort, home, sleep, auto, or baby.

setState.title: Humidifier State
setState.description: Action to set the state of the humidifier (on/off)

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Humidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart humidifier that can be controlled and monitored through MQTT messages, featuring properties for humidity status, current level, target settings, threshold alerts, and various operating modes

humidifierStatus.title: Humidifier Status
humidifierStatus.description: The current operational status of the humidifier, indicating whether it is running (ON), stopped (OFF), in a standby state (IDLE), or in an unknown condition.

currentHumidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
currentHumidityLevel.description: The current humidity level in the room, measured as a percentage.

targetOkTimestamp.title: Target OK Timestamp
targetOkTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the target humidity was last reached successfully. This timestamp represents a state value that can be read.

thresholdBelowEvent.title: Threshold Below Event
thresholdBelowEvent.description: An event that indicates when the humidity level falls below a certain threshold. The timestamp in Unix epoch format is provided as payload.

targetHumiditySet.title: Target Humidity Setting
targetHumiditySet.description: This affordance allows setting the target humidity level for the humidifier. It accepts integer values representing percentage points.

humidityThresholdSet.title: Humidity Threshold Set
humidityThresholdSet.description: Set the humidity threshold value for the humidifier.

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode Setting
setMode.description: Sets the operating mode of the humidifier. The device supports multiple modes including normal, eco, away, boost, comfort, home, sleep, auto, and baby.

setHumidifierState.title: Humidifier State
setHumidifierState.description: Sets the state of the humidifier to either on or off.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Humidifier
llm_td_lst.description: A smart humidifier that can be controlled via MQTT to adjust humidity levels, set modes, and monitor status. It includes features for setting target humidity, threshold alerts, and operational modes.

humidifierStatus.title: Humidifier Status
humidifierStatus.description: The current operational status of the humidifier, which can be UNKNOWN, ON, OFF, or IDLE.

currentHumidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
currentHumidityLevel.description: The current humidity level in the room as measured by the humidifier. This value represents the actual humidity percentage.

targetOkStatus.title: Target OK Status
targetOkStatus.description: Indicates when the humidifier has reached its target humidity level. The timestamp payloads represent Unix timestamps in seconds.

humidityThresholdBelowEvent.title: Humidity Threshold Below Event
humidityThresholdBelowEvent.description: Event triggered when the humidity level falls below a specified threshold. This event contains Unix timestamp data.

setHumidityTarget.title: Set Humidity Target
setHumidityTarget.description: Sets the desired humidity level for the humidifier. The value represents a percentage.

thresholdSet.title: Humidity Threshold Setting
thresholdSet.description: The humidity threshold setting allows the user to specify a target humidity level below which the humidifier will activate. This value can be adjusted between 20 and 72 based on the observed payloads.

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode Setting
setMode.description: This affordance allows setting the operational mode of the humidifier. It accepts string values representing different modes such as normal, eco, away, boost, comfort, home, sleep, auto, and baby.

setHumidifierState.title: Humidifier State Control
setHumidifierState.description: Control the power state of the humidifier by setting it to on or off.

llm_td_lst.title: Living Room Humidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart humidifier device located in the living room, capable of monitoring and controlling humidity levels through various modes and settings.

humidifierStatus.title: Humidifier Status
humidifierStatus.description: The current operational status of the humidifier, which can be UNKNOWN, ON, OFF, or IDLE.

humidityLevel.title: Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: Current humidity level in the room measured by the humidifier

targetOkStatus.title: Target OK Status
targetOkStatus.description: This affordance represents the timestamp when the humidifier reached its target humidity level. The values are Unix timestamps in seconds.

thresholdBelowEvent.title: Threshold Below Event
thresholdBelowEvent.description: This event indicates when the humidity level falls below a certain threshold. It appears to be an event that is triggered at specific timestamps, suggesting it's used to track or log when the humidity drops below a set point.

targetHumiditySet.title: Target Humidity Setting
targetHumiditySet.description: This affordance allows setting the target humidity level for the humidifier. It accepts numerical values representing percentage points.

setThresholdBelow.title: Humidity Threshold Setting
setThresholdBelow.description: Sets the minimum humidity threshold for the humidifier. When the actual humidity falls below this value, the device will activate to increase the humidity.

setMode.title: Humidifier Mode Setting
setMode.description: This affordance allows setting the operational mode of the humidifier. The mode can be one of several predefined options, including normal, eco, away, boost, comfort, home, sleep, auto, or baby.

setHumidifierState.title: Humidifier State Control
setHumidifierState.description: Control the state (on/off) of the humidifier device in the living room.

base_td.title: Air Conditioner
base_td.description: The Air Conditioning (AC) unit in the office room

swing.title: Swing state
swing.description: The swing of the AC unit can be 'ON' or 'OFF'

fanMode.title: Fan Mode
fanMode.description: Fan mode of the AC unit

temperature.title: Air temperature
temperature.description: Current air temperature measured by the AC unit

setPoint.title: Target temperature reached
setPoint.description: The target temperature has been reached

setTemp.title: Target Temperature
setTemp.description: Set the target temperature of the AC unit

setPower.title: AC Power Mode
setPower.description: Set the power mode of the AC unit

setFan.title: Fan Mode
setFan.description: Set the fan mode of the AC unit

llm_td_lst.title: Office Air Conditioner
llm_td_lst.description: An air conditioning unit located in the office, capable of controlling temperature, fan speed, and various operational modes.

acStatus.title: Air Conditioner Status
acStatus.description: The current operational status of the air conditioner, which can be UNKNOWN, COOL, OFF, STANDBY, or FAN_ONLY.

acSwingControl.title: AC Swing Control
acSwingControl.description: Controls whether the air conditioner's swing feature is enabled or disabled. The swing feature allows the AC to distribute air in different directions.

fanSpeed.title: AC Fan Speed
fanSpeed.description: The current fan speed setting of the AC unit. It can be read to determine the current fan speed.

currentTemperature.title: Current Temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the air conditioner sensor.

setpointOkStatus.title: Setpoint OK Status
setpointOkStatus.description: Indicates whether the setpoint value has been successfully applied to the AC system. Returns null when no action has been taken or the status is unknown.

setTemperatureSetpoint.title: Set Temperature Setpoint
setTemperatureSetpoint.description: Sets the desired temperature setpoint for the air conditioner.

acModeSet.title: AC Mode Setting
acModeSet.description: The AC mode setting allows the user to set different operation modes for the air conditioner. The available modes are eco, sleep, and full.

fanSpeedControl.title: Air Conditioner Fan Speed Control
fanSpeedControl.description: This affordance allows setting the fan speed of the air conditioner to different levels (off, low, medium, high)

llm_td_lst.title: Air Conditioner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart air conditioner with controllable temperature, fan speed, and operational modes.

acStatus.title: Status of Air Conditioner
acStatus.description: The current operational status of the air conditioner, which can be in one of several states including unknown, cooling mode, off, standby, or fan-only mode.

acFanSpeedStatus.title: AC Fan Speed
acFanSpeedStatus.description: This describes the fan speed status of an AC unit, which can be OFF, LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH. This is a property that exposes the state of the Thing.

currentTemperature.title: Temperature Reading
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the AC unit in the office. This property allows consumers to retrieve the current temperature value.

setpointOkStatus.title: Setpoint OK Status
setpointOkStatus.description: Indicates whether the setpoint has been successfully applied to the AC unit. Returns null when no status update is available.

acSwingControl.title: AC Swing Control
acSwingControl.description: Controls whether the AC unit's swing feature is enabled or disabled. The swing feature allows for automatic adjustment of the air flow direction.

setTemperatureSetpoint.title: Set Temperature Setpoint
setTemperatureSetpoint.description: This affordance allows setting the desired temperature for the AC unit. It accepts numeric values representing different temperatures.

setMode.title: Air Conditioner Mode Setting
setMode.description: Sets the operating mode of the air conditioner to eco, sleep, or full power.

acFanSpeedSet.title: AC Fan Speed Setting
acFanSpeedSet.description: This affordance allows setting the fan speed of the air conditioner to different levels.

llm_td_lst.title: Air Conditioner Control System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart air conditioning system that allows control of temperature, fan speed, and operational modes through MQTT communication protocol.

acStatus.title: Air Conditioner Status
acStatus.description: The current operational status of the air conditioner, which can be UNKNOWN, COOL, OFF, STANDBY, or FAN_ONLY.

acSwingControl.title: AC Swing Control
acSwingControl.description: Control whether the AC's swing feature is on or off.

fanSpeedStatus.title: Fan Speed Status
fanSpeedStatus.description: The current speed setting of the air conditioner's fan.

currentTemperature.title: Current Temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the AC unit in the office. The value represents a numeric measurement.

setpointOkStatus.title: Setpoint OK Status
setpointOkStatus.description: Indicates whether the setpoint has been successfully applied to the AC unit. Returns null when no new setpoint has been received.

setDesiredTemperature.title: Set the desired temperature for the AC
setDesiredTemperature.description: This action allows setting a specific target temperature for the air conditioning system. The value represents the desired temperature in degrees.

acModeSet.title: AC Mode Setting
acModeSet.description: This affordance allows setting the operating mode of the AC unit to different presets like eco, sleep or full power.

acFanSpeedSet.title: AC Fan Speed Setting
acFanSpeedSet.description: This affordance allows the user to set the fan speed of the AC unit. It accepts string values representing different fan speeds.

llm_td_lst.title: Office Air Conditioner
llm_td_lst.description: An air conditioning unit located in the office, capable of controlling temperature, fan speed, and operational modes.

acStatus.title: AC Status
acStatus.description: The current operating status of the air conditioner. Possible values are UNKNOWN, COOL, OFF, STANDBY, and FAN_ONLY.

acSwingControl.title: Air Conditioner Swing Control
acSwingControl.description: This property controls whether the AC's swing function is enabled or disabled. The swing function allows the air flow direction to be automatically adjusted.

acFanSpeed.title: AC Fan Speed
acFanSpeed.description: The current speed setting of the air conditioner fan

currentTemperature.title: Current Temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the AC unit in degrees Celsius. This value can be read but not directly set.

setpointOkStatus.title: Setpoint OK Status
setpointOkStatus.description: Indicates whether the setpoint has been successfully accepted by the AC system. The null values suggest that no specific status information is provided, but rather a confirmation of receipt.

setTemperatureSetpoint.title: Set Temperature Setpoint
setTemperatureSetpoint.description: This action sets the desired temperature for the air conditioner. The setpoint can be updated by sending a new value.

acModeSet.title: Air Conditioner Mode
acModeSet.description: This affordance represents the different operational modes available for the air conditioner. It allows users to set the AC's mode to eco, sleep, or full.

fanSpeedSet.title: Fan Speed Setting
fanSpeedSet.description: Sets the fan speed of the AC unit to one of four predefined values.

llm_td_lst.title: Office Air Conditioner Control System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart air conditioning system that allows remote control and monitoring of temperature, fan speed, operating mode, and other settings through MQTT communication.

acStatus.title: AC Status
acStatus.description: The current operational status of the AC unit. Can be UNKNOWN, COOL, OFF, STANDBY or FAN_ONLY.

acFanSpeed.title: AC Fan Speed
acFanSpeed.description: The current fan speed setting of the AC unit. It can be one of OFF, LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH.

currentTemperature.title: Current Temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the air conditioning unit in the office.

setpointOkStatus.title: Setpoint OK Status
setpointOkStatus.description: Indicates whether the setpoint has been successfully applied to the AC system. Returns null when no status update is available.

acSwingControl.title: AC Swing Control
acSwingControl.description: Control the swing function of the air conditioner

setTemperatureSetpoint.title: Set Temperature Setpoint
setTemperatureSetpoint.description: This action allows setting the desired temperature setpoint for the air conditioner.

acModeSet.title: AC Mode Setting
acModeSet.description: Allows setting the operating mode of the air conditioner to different presets like eco, sleep or full power.

setFanSpeed.title: Set Fan Speed
setFanSpeed.description: Sets the fan speed to one of the available options (off, low, medium, high)

base_td.title: MyIlluminanceSensor
base_td.description: A sensor that measures illuminance

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: Calibration state of the illuminance sensor. This can either be  good i.e., 'ok', 'unknown' or erroneous i.e., 'error'

calibrate.title: Calibration
calibrate.description: Calibrate the sensor for accurate readings

llm_td_lst.title: Environmental Sensor Device
llm_td_lst.description: A sensor device that measures environmental parameters such as illuminance, uptime, and operational status. It also supports calibration functionality.

operationStatus.title: Operation Status
operationStatus.description: The current operational status of the sensor. It can be in one of three states: unknown, normal, or fault.

uptimeSensor.title: Uptime Sensor
uptimeSensor.description: The uptime sensor provides the current timestamp indicating how long the device has been running.

illuminanceSensor.title: Illuminance Sensor
illuminanceSensor.description: A property that describes the current illuminance level measured by the sensor in lux.

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: Indicates the current calibration status of the sensor. Possible values are 'ok', 'unknown' and 'error'.

calibrateAction.title: Calibration Action
calibrateAction.description: An action to calibrate the sensor with a specific calibration value.

llm_td_lst.title: Environmental Sensor Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models an environmental sensor device that monitors illuminance levels, tracks operational status, and supports calibration functionality.

sensorOperationStatus.title: Operation Status
sensorOperationStatus.description: The operational status of the sensor, which can be unknown, normal, or fault.

uptimeSensor.title: Uptime Sensor
uptimeSensor.description: The uptime sensor provides the current timestamp when the device was last operational.

illuminanceLevel.title: Illuminance Sensor Reading
illuminanceLevel.description: Property that represents the current illuminance level measured by the sensor in lux.

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: Indicates the current calibration status of the sensor. The possible values are 'ok', 'unknown', and 'error'. This property reflects the state of the sensor's calibration.

calibrateAction.title: Calibration Action
calibrateAction.description: This affordance allows to trigger a calibration process on the sensor. The payload represents the calibration value that should be applied.

llm_td_lst.title: Environmental Sensor Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a sensor device that measures environmental conditions, including illuminance, operational status, uptime tracking, and calibration capabilities.

operationStatus.title: Operation Status
operationStatus.description: The current operational status of the sensor, indicating whether it's in an unknown state, operating normally, or experiencing a fault.

uptimeSensor.title: Uptime Sensor
uptimeSensor.description: This sensor tracks the uptime of the device, providing timestamp information about when the device was operational.

illuminanceReading.title: Illuminance Sensor Reading
illuminanceReading.description: The illuminance sensor provides light intensity readings in lux. The values are numerical and represent the current ambient light level.

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: The current calibration status of the sensor, which can be 'ok', 'unknown', or 'error'. This property reflects the device's ability to provide accurate measurements.

calibrateSensor.title: Calibrate Sensor
calibrateSensor.description: An action to calibrate the sensor with a specific value.

llm_td_lst.title: Illuminance Sensor Device with Calibration Capabilities
llm_td_lst.description: A sensor device that measures illuminance levels and supports calibration operations. It provides operational status, uptime tracking, and calibration status monitoring through MQTT communication.

operationStatus.title: Operation Status
operationStatus.description: The current operational status of the device, which can be unknown, normal, or fault.

sensorUptime.title: Uptime Sensor
sensorUptime.description: This affordance represents the uptime tracking of the sensor, providing timestamp information about when the device was active.

currentIlluminanceLevel.title: Illuminance Sensor Reading
currentIlluminanceLevel.description: The current illuminance level measured by the sensor in lux.

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: The current calibration status of the sensor, which can be 'ok', 'unknown', or 'error'. This property reflects whether the sensor has been properly calibrated.

calibrateSensor.title: Calibration Action
calibrateSensor.description: An action to calibrate the sensor device. The calibration value is sent as a numeric input.

llm_td_lst.title: Illuminance Sensor Device
llm_td_lst.description: A light sensor device that measures illuminance levels, provides operational status and calibration capabilities.

sensorOperationStatus.title: Sensor Operation Status
sensorOperationStatus.description: Indicates the current operational status of the sensor, which can be unknown, normal, or fault.

sensorUptime.title: Uptime Sensor
sensorUptime.description: This affordance represents the uptime of the sensor, providing timestamp information about when the device was active.

currentIlluminanceLevel.title: Illuminance Sensor Reading
currentIlluminanceLevel.description: The current illuminance level measured by the sensor in lux.

calibrationStatus.title: Calibration Status
calibrationStatus.description: The current status of the device's calibration. Possible values are 'ok', 'unknown', and 'error'.

calibrateAction.title: Calibration Action
calibrateAction.description: The calibrate action allows to trigger a calibration process on the sensor. It accepts an integer value which likely represents calibration parameters or settings.

base_td.title: Lawn Mower
base_td.description: A smart lawn mower

activity.title: Mower State
activity.description: The state of the lawn mower, it can be docked, undocked, charging or mowing the lawn.

battery.title: Battery
battery.description: Battery percentage of the lawn mower

reachEstimate.title: Reach Estimate
reachEstimate.description: Estimated reach in minutes until next recharge

start.title: Start Job
start.description: Initiate a new lawn mower job

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Lawn Mower Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart autonomous lawn mower that can be controlled and monitored remotely through MQTT messages. It features properties for monitoring its state, battery charge, reach distance, and docking status. The device also supports actions for starting, pausing, and controlling the docking mechanism.

lawnMowerState.title: Lawn Mower State
lawnMowerState.description: The current state of the lawn mower, which can be UNDOCKED, DOCKED, CHARGING, or MOWING. This property exposes the state of the Thing.

soc.title: State of Charge
soc.description: The current state of charge (SOC) of the lawn mower's battery, represented as a percentage value.

reachAffordance.title: Reach Affordance
reachAffordance.description: The reach value represents the maximum distance or area the lawn mower can cover in a single session.

dockStatus.title: Docking Status
dockStatus.description: Represents the current docking status of the lawn mower, indicating whether it is docked or undocked.

startAffordance.title: Start Affordance
startAffordance.description: An action to start the lawn mower. When invoked, it changes the state of the device.

pauseControl.title: Pause Control
pauseControl.description: An action to pause or resume the lawn mower's operation. When set to true, the device stops its current task until further instructions are received.

dockAction.title: Docking action
dockAction.description: An Interaction Affordance that allows to invoke a function of the Thing, which manipulates state (e.g., docking/un-docking the lawn mower)

llm_td_lst.title: Lawn Mower Plus
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lawn mower with features like state monitoring, battery management, and remote control capabilities.

lawnMowerState.title: Lawn Mower State
lawnMowerState.description: The current state of the lawn mower, which can be UNDOCKED, DOCKED, CHARGING, or MOWING.

stateOfCharge.title: State of Charge
stateOfCharge.description: The state of charge (SoC) represents the remaining battery capacity as a percentage. It indicates how much energy is left in the device's battery.

lawnMowerReach.title: Lawn Mower Reach
lawnMowerReach.description: The current reach or range setting of the lawn mower, measured in units (likely centimeters or millimeters)

dockStatus.title: Dock Status
dockStatus.description: The current dock status of the lawn mower, indicating whether it is currently docked or undocked.

startLawnMower.title: Start the Lawn Mower
startLawnMower.description: An action to start or stop the lawn mower. This affordance allows users to control the operation of the device.

pauseCommand.title: Pause Command
pauseCommand.description: An action to pause the lawn mower's operation. This affordance allows controlling whether the device should temporarily stop its current task.

dockAction.title: Dock Action
dockAction.description: An action to dock the lawnmower.

llm_td_lst.title: Lawn Mower Robot
llm_td_lst.description: A robotic lawn mower with autonomous capabilities, including state monitoring and control actions for mowing, docking, charging, and battery management.

lawnMowerState.title: Lawn Mower State
lawnMowerState.description: The current state of the lawn mower, which can be UNDOCKED, DOCKED, CHARGING, or MOWING.

soc.title: State of Charge
soc.description: The current state of charge (SoC) of the device's battery, measured as a percentage.

reachAffordance.title: Reach Affordance
reachAffordance.description: Represents the reach or range of the lawn mower in meters.

dockStatus.title: Dock Status
dockStatus.description: The current dock status of the lawn mower, indicating whether it is docked or undocked.

startAffordance.title: Start Affordance
startAffordance.description: An action to start the lawn mower. When invoked with true, it starts mowing; when set to false, it stops.

pauseLawnMower.title: Pause Lawn Mower
pauseLawnMower.description: An action to pause the lawn mower's operation. It can be either paused (true) or unpaused (false).

dockControl.title: Docking Control
dockControl.description: This affordance allows the device to control docking actions. It can be used to initiate or stop the docking process.

llm_td_lst.title: Lawn Mower Robot
llm_td_lst.description: A robotic lawn mower with autonomous mowing capabilities, docking functionality, and controllable through MQTT messages.

lawnMowerState.title: Lawn Mower State
lawnMowerState.description: The current state of the lawn mower (UNDOCKED, DOCKED, CHARGING, or MOWING)

soc.title: State of Charge
soc.description: The state of charge (SoC) of the lawn mower's battery, represented as a percentage between 0 and 100.

reachDistance.title: Reach Affordance
reachDistance.description: The reach distance of the lawn mower in centimeters, indicating how far it can mow from its current position.

dockStatus.title: Dock Status
dockStatus.description: Indicates whether the lawn mower is currently docked or undocked. This property reflects the current state of the docking status.

startControl.title: Start Control
startControl.description: An action to start or stop the lawn mower.

pauseFunction.title: Pause Functionality
pauseFunction.description: This affordance allows to pause or resume the lawn mower's operation.

dockAffordance.title: Docking Affordance
dockAffordance.description: An action to initiate docking process for the lawn mower.

llm_td_lst.title: Autonomous Lawn Mower
llm_td_lst.description: An autonomous robotic lawn mower with features like state monitoring, battery management, docking control, and operational commands.

lawnMowerState.title: Lawn Mower State
lawnMowerState.description: The current state of the lawn mower, including whether it's docked, undocked, charging, or mowing.

soc.title: Battery State of Charge
soc.description: The state of charge (SoC) of the lawn mower's battery, indicating how much energy remains in the battery.

reachProperty.title: Reach Property
reachProperty.description: The reach property indicates the current distance or range that the lawn mower can cover, measured in meters. This property reflects the operational capability of the device.

dockStatus.title: Dock Status
dockStatus.description: The current status of the dock, indicating whether the device is docked or undocked.

startAffordance.title: Start Affordance
startAffordance.description: This affordance allows to start or stop the lawn mower.

pauseAffordance.title: Pause Affordance
pauseAffordance.description: This affordance allows pausing and resuming the lawn mower's operation.

dockCommand.title: Docking Control
dockCommand.description: An action that allows the user to command the lawn mower to dock or undock.

base_td.title: RGB Light Bulb
base_td.description: A dimmable RGB light bulb

status.title: Bulb State
status.description: The current state of the light bulb, it can be on, off or failed

set.title: Brightness RGB channels
set.description: Set the brightness of the individual R, G and B channel

power.title: Power
power.description: Turn the bulb on or off

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Back Door Lock Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock system that controls the state of a back door, allowing for manual overrides, timed unlocks, and monitoring of lock states.

backdoorLockState.title: Back Door Lock State
backdoorLockState.description: The current state of the back door lock, which can be unknown, locked, unlocked, or jammed.

backdoorLockRemainingTime.title: Backdoor Lock Remaining Time
backdoorLockRemainingTime.description: The time remaining until the lock automatically changes state (e.g., unlocks). This value decreases over time and can be used to determine when the lock will transition.

manualOverwrite.title: Manual Overwrite
manualOverwrite.description: An action to manually override the lock state. It takes no parameters and returns nothing (null).

backDoorLockAction.title: Lock Action
backDoorLockAction.description: An action to lock the back door.

unlockAction.title: Unlock
unlockAction.description: An action to unlock the backdoor lock, which takes a numeric parameter representing time.

llm_td_lst.title: Back Door Smart Lock
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock device that controls the back door, featuring manual override capabilities, automatic locking/unlocking with time settings, and real-time state monitoring.

lockState.title: Lock State
lockState.description: The current state of the lock, indicating whether it's locked, unlocked, unknown or jammed.

backdoorLockRemainingTime.title: Backdoor Lock Remaining Time Property
backdoorLockRemainingTime.description: The remaining time until the lock state changes, measured in seconds. This is a retained property that can be read to determine how long before the next state change.

manualOverride.title: Manual Override
manualOverride.description: This affordance allows manual override of the lock state. It appears to be an action that can be triggered, as indicated by the null payloads and non-retained messages.

lockAction.title: Lock Action
lockAction.description: An action to lock the back door. This will change the state of the lock from unlocked to locked.

backdoorLockUnlock.title: Unlock Lock Action
backdoorLockUnlock.description: Action to unlock the back door lock with a specified time value

llm_td_lst.title: Back Door Smart Lock
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock system for a back door that allows remote locking, unlocking with duration control, and manual override capabilities.

backdoorLockState.title: Back Door Lock State
backdoorLockState.description: The current state of the back door lock, which can be unknown, locked, unlocked, or jammed.

backdoorLockRemainingTime.title: Back Door Lock Remaining Time
backdoorLockRemainingTime.description: The remaining time until the lock automatically changes state, measured in seconds with decimal precision.

manualOverride.title: Manual Override
manualOverride.description: An action to manually override the lock's current state. When invoked, it pushes a null value to indicate that manual control has been activated.

backdoorLockAction.title: Lock Action
backdoorLockAction.description: An action to lock the back door

unlockAction.title: Unlock Action
unlockAction.description: An action that unlocks the back door lock with a specified duration in milliseconds.

llm_td_lst.title: Backdoor Smart Lock
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock system that controls and monitors the back door's locking mechanism, featuring manual override capabilities, state monitoring, and time-based operation tracking.

backdoorLockState.title: Backdoor Lock State
backdoorLockState.description: Represents the current state of the backdoor lock, which can be unknown, locked, unlocked, or jammed.

lockRemainingTime.title: Lock Remaining Time
lockRemainingTime.description: Represents the remaining time for a lock operation in seconds

unlockTime.title: Unlock Time
unlockTime.description: The time in seconds when the lock was last unlocked, represented as a floating-point number.

manualOverrideControl.title: Manual Override Control
manualOverrideControl.description: An action to manually override the lock's automatic behavior. When triggered, it allows temporary control over the lock regardless of its current state.

backdoorLockLock.title: Lock Action
backdoorLockLock.description: Action to lock the back door.

llm_td_lst.title: Backdoor Lock System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock system that controls and monitors the state of a backdoor, featuring manual override capabilities, automatic locking functionality, and real-time status updates.

backdoorLockState.title: Backdoor Lock State
backdoorLockState.description: The current state of the backdoor lock, which can be unknown, locked, unlocked, or jammed.

remainingTime.title: Remaining Time
remainingTime.description: The remaining time until the lock automatically changes state, measured in seconds.

manualOverride.title: Manual Override
manualOverride.description: A property that indicates whether the lock's manual override feature has been activated. It can be set to null to reset or deactivate the override.

backDoorLockLock.title: Lock Action
backDoorLockLock.description: This action locks the back door lock.

unlockBackdoorLock.title: Unlock Action
unlockBackdoorLock.description: Action to unlock the backdoor lock with a specified duration in milliseconds.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that monitors and reports power consumption metrics including current measurements, total consumption, daily usage, and status information.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the smart meter, indicating whether it's operational or experiencing issues.

currentMeasurements.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurements.description: The current measurements for the three phases (L1, L2, L3) in amperes.

currentPowerReading.title: Power Reading
currentPowerReading.description: The current power consumption reading in watts, measured by the smart meter.

totalPowerConsumption.title: Total Power Consumption
totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption measured by the smart meter in kilowatt-hours (kWh). This value represents the cumulative energy usage over time.

powerTodayConsumption.title: Today's Power Consumption
powerTodayConsumption.description: Represents the current day's power consumption in kWh.

power15minConsumption.title: Power consumption in the last 15 minutes
power15minConsumption.description: This affordance represents the power usage measured over a 15-minute interval.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that monitors and reports electrical power consumption, including current measurements, total consumption, daily usage, and status information.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current operational status of the smart meter, indicating whether it's functioning correctly (OK) or experiencing issues (ERROR). This property reflects the device's state and can be observed for monitoring purposes.

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurement.description: The current measurements for the three phases (L1, L2, L3) in the smart meter.

currentPowerConsumption.title: Current Power Consumption
currentPowerConsumption.description: Represents the current power consumption in watts, which can be positive (consumption) or negative (production)

powerTotalConsumption.title: Total Power Consumption
powerTotalConsumption.description: The total power consumption measured by the smart meter in kilowatt-hours (kWh)

powerTodayConsumption.title: Today's Power Consumption
powerTodayConsumption.description: The power consumption recorded today by the smart meter.

power15MinInterval.title: Power Consumption in 15-Minute Intervals
power15MinInterval.description: An observable property that provides the power consumption measured over 15-minute intervals.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that measures and reports electrical power consumption, including real-time status, phase measurements, current power usage, total energy consumption, daily consumption, and short-term consumption trends.

deviceStatus.title: Device Status
deviceStatus.description: The current operational status of the smart meter device, indicating whether it's functioning normally (OK) or experiencing issues (ERROR)

currentPhaseMeasurements.title: Current Phase Measurements
currentPhaseMeasurements.description: An Interaction Affordance that exposes the current measurements for each phase (L1, L2, L3) of the smart meter. This state can then be retrieved (read). The values are provided in amperes.

powerReading.title: Power Reading
powerReading.description: The current power consumption measured by the smart meter.

totalPowerMeasurement.title: Total Power Measurement
totalPowerMeasurement.description: The total power measurement from the smart meter, indicating cumulative energy consumption over time.

powerTodayConsumption.title: Today's Power Consumption
powerTodayConsumption.description: The current day's power consumption in kWh for the smart meter.

power15MinConsumption.title: Power consumption in the last 15 minutes
power15MinConsumption.description: The power consumed by the device over the past 15 minutes, measured in watts.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that measures and monitors electrical power consumption, providing real-time data on device status, current measurements for three phases (L1, L2, L3), total power consumption in kWh, daily power usage, and 15-minute interval consumption.

deviceStatus.title: Device Status
deviceStatus.description: Represents the current operational status of the device, indicating whether it's functioning normally (OK) or experiencing issues (ERROR)

currentMeasurements.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurements.description: The current measurements for the three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the smart meter.

currentPowerConsumption.title: Current Power Consumption
currentPowerConsumption.description: The current power consumption measured by the smart meter in watts.

totalPowerConsumption.title: Total Power Consumption
totalPowerConsumption.description: The total power consumption measured by the smart meter in kilowatt-hours (kWh)

powerTodayConsumption.title: Today's Power Consumption
powerTodayConsumption.description: This property represents the power consumption for today, measured in watts. The value can be read to monitor current energy usage.

power15MinConsumption.title: Power consumption in the last 15 minutes
power15MinConsumption.description: The power consumption measured over a period of 15 minutes.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart meter that monitors and measures electrical power consumption, providing real-time status updates, current measurements across three phases (L1, L2, L3), instantaneous power readings in watts, total power consumption over time, daily consumption in kWh, and 15-minute interval consumption data.

deviceStatus.title: Device Status
deviceStatus.description: Represents the current status of the device, indicating whether it's operational or experiencing an issue.

currentMeasurements.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurements.description: The current measurements for each phase (L1, L2, L3) of the smart meter.

powerMeasurement.title: Power Measurement
powerMeasurement.description: This property represents the instantaneous power measurement from the smart meter in watts.

powerTotalConsumption.title: Total Power Consumption
powerTotalConsumption.description: The total power consumption measured by the smart meter over a certain period.

powerConsumptionToday.title: Today's Power Consumption
powerConsumptionToday.description: The current day's power consumption in kWh

powerLast15MinutesConsumption.title: Power Consumption in Last 15 Minutes
powerLast15MinutesConsumption.description: The power consumption measured over the last 15 minutes from the smart meter.

base_td.title: Smart Meter
base_td.description: A Smart Meter

current.title: Current
current.description: Current of the L1, L2 and L3 phases

power.title: Power
power.description: Current power consumption as measured by the SM

total.title: Total Energy
total.description: The total energy consumption measured by the SM

today.title: Total Energy
today.description: The total daily energy consumption measured by the SM

now.title: Total Energy
now.description: The energy consumption measured by the SM in the last 15 min

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that monitors and reports electrical consumption data, including current readings for three phases (L1, L2, L3), power measurements (total, today, now), and device status.

smartMeterStatus.title: Smart Meter Status
smartMeterStatus.description: The current status of the smart meter, indicating whether it's functioning normally (OK) or has encountered an error (ERROR). This property provides a quick overview of the device's operational state.

currentReadings.title: Current readings for each phase
currentReadings.description: This affordance represents the current readings (in amperes) for phases L1, L2 and L3 in a three-phase electrical system. The values are continuously updated to reflect real-time measurements.

powerMeasurement.title: Power Measurement
powerMeasurement.description: An Interaction Affordance that exposes the power measurement state of the smart meter.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device Model
llm_td_lst.description: A device model representing a smart meter that monitors and reports electrical consumption data, including status, current measurements for three phases, and power consumption statistics.

smartMeterStatus.title: Smart Meter Status
smartMeterStatus.description: Represents the operational status of the smart meter, indicating whether it is functioning normally (OK) or experiencing issues (ERROR).

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurement
currentMeasurement.description: This property represents the current measurements for three phases (L1, L2, L3) in a smart meter.

powerConsumptionData.title: Power Consumption
powerConsumptionData.description: This affordance represents the power consumption data from a smart meter. It includes total power consumed over time, daily consumption, and current power usage.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter device that monitors and reports electrical power consumption, including status indicators, current measurements across three phases (L1, L2, L3), and various power measurement metrics.

statusIndicator.title: Status Indicator
statusIndicator.description: Indicates the current operational status of the smart meter device. It can be either 'OK' or 'ERROR', representing whether the device is functioning normally or experiencing issues.

currentMeasurements.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurements.description: The current measurements for the three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the smart meter.

powerMeasurement.title: Power Measurement
powerMeasurement.description: An interaction affordance that exposes the power consumption state of the smart meter.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that measures electricity consumption, providing real-time status updates and power measurements across three phases.

smartMeterStatus.title: Smart Meter Status
smartMeterStatus.description: The current operational status of the smart meter, indicating whether it's functioning normally (OK) or experiencing issues (ERROR)

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurement.description: This property exposes the current measurements for three phases (L1, L2, L3) from a smart meter.

powerMeasurement.title: Power Measurement
powerMeasurement.description: The power measurement affordance provides information about the total energy consumption, today's usage and current power consumption.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Meter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart meter that monitors and reports electrical consumption data including current measurements, power consumption metrics, and device status.

deviceStatus.title: Status indicator
deviceStatus.description: The status of the smart meter, indicating whether it's functioning correctly (OK) or has encountered an error (ERROR)

currentMeasurements.title: Current Measurements
currentMeasurements.description: The current measurements from the smart meter's three phases (L1, L2, L3)

powerConsumptionMetrics.title: Power Consumption
powerConsumptionMetrics.description: This affordance represents the power consumption metrics of the smart meter. It includes total power consumed over time, today's consumption, and current power usage.

base_td.title: PV Inverter
base_td.description: A Photovoltaic Inverter

inverterStatus.title: Invert Status
inverterStatus.description: Status of the PV inverter. There are 13 different states

current.title: Current
current.description: Current draw of the L1, L2 and L3 phases

activePower.title: Active Power
activePower.description: Active Power running through the inverter

reactivePower.title: Reactive Power
reactivePower.description: Reactive Power measured by the inverter

error.title: Error Event
error.description: An error has been encountered at the inverter
