llm_td_lst.title: Solar Inverter
llm_td_lst.description: A solar inverter is a critical component in a photovoltaic system that converts DC electricity generated by solar panels into AC electricity for use in homes or businesses. This Thing Description models a device capable of monitoring various operational parameters such as current, power measurements, temperature, and status codes, while also allowing control commands to be sent.

inverterStatus.title: Inverter Status
inverterStatus.description: Represents the current status of the inverter with different error codes and operational states.

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurement
currentMeasurement.description: The current measurement property represents the electrical current in amperes flowing through each phase (L1, L2, and L3) of the inverter.

activePowerMeasurement.title: Active Power
activePowerMeasurement.description: The active power measurement from the inverter, representing real power consumption in watts.

reactivePowerMeasurement.title: Reactive Power Measurement
reactivePowerMeasurement.description: The reactive power measurement from the inverter, measured in apparent power units (VA)

inverterTemperature.title: Inverter Temperature
inverterTemperature.description: The temperature reading from the inverter device, measured in degrees Celsius.

currentState.title: Current State
currentState.description: Represents the current operational state of the inverter (on/off)

errorStatus.title: Error Status
errorStatus.description: Reports the error state of the inverter. Returns null if there are no errors.

inverterCommand.title: Inverter Command
inverterCommand.description: This affordance allows sending commands to the inverter, such as turning it ON or OFF.

llm_td_lst.title: Inverter Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a power inverter device, which is responsible for converting DC power to AC power. The TD includes properties and actions related to monitoring the inverter's status, current, power measurements, temperature, and control commands.

inverterStatus.title: Inverter Status
inverterStatus.description: The current status of the inverter, indicating various operational states and fault conditions.

inverterCurrent.title: Inverter Current
inverterCurrent.description: The current state of the inverter's three phases (L1, L2, L3)

activePowerMeasurement.title: Active Power Measurement
activePowerMeasurement.description: The active power measurement represents the real power consumed or produced by the inverter, measured in watts.

reactivePower.title: Reactive Power
reactivePower.description: The reactive power measurement from the inverter, measured in VA.

inverterTemperature.title: Inverter Temperature
inverterTemperature.description: The temperature reading from the inverter device, measured in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit.

currentState.title: Current State
currentState.description: Represents the current operational state of the inverter (on/off)

inverterErrorStatus.title: Inverter Error Status
inverterErrorStatus.description: Represents the error state of the inverter, with a value of null indicating no errors.

inverterCommandControl.title: Command Control
inverterCommandControl.description: This affordance allows sending commands to control the inverter's state. The possible values are ON, OFF, 0, or 1.

llm_td_lst.title: Inverter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A power inverter that converts DC electricity to AC, with monitoring and control capabilities for voltage, current, temperature, and operational state.

inverterStatus.title: Inverter Status
inverterStatus.description: The current status of the inverter, indicating its operational state or any issues it may be experiencing.

currentReadings.title: Current Readings
currentReadings.description: The current readings for the three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the inverter.

activePowerMeasurement.title: Active Power Measurement
activePowerMeasurement.description: The active power measurement property represents the real power consumed by or produced from the inverter, measured in watts.

reactivePower.title: Reactive Power
reactivePower.description: The reactive power measurement from the inverter, measured in VAR.

inverterTemperature.title: Inverter Temperature
inverterTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the inverter device, measured in degrees Celsius.

currentState.title: Current State
currentState.description: Represents the current operational state of the inverter (on/off)

errorStatus.title: Error Status
errorStatus.description: Represents the error status of the inverter, which can be either an error message or null if no error exists.

inverterCommand.title: Inverter Command
inverterCommand.description: Command to control the inverter's state

llm_td_lst.title: Inverter Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models an inverter device, specifically one that can monitor various operational states and measurements such as current, power consumption, temperature, and error status. It also allows for control actions like turning the inverter on or off.

inverterStatus.title: Inverter Status
inverterStatus.description: Represents the current status of the inverter, including various operational and error states.

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurement
currentMeasurement.description: Measures the current in three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the inverter

activePowerMeasurement.title: Active Power Measurement
activePowerMeasurement.description: The active power measurement property represents the real power consumed or produced by the inverter, measured in watts.

reactivePowerProperty.title: Reactive Power Property
reactivePowerProperty.description: The reactive power measured by the inverter, representing the non-real power consumed or produced.

inverterTemperature.title: Temperature Measurement
inverterTemperature.description: The temperature measurement from the inverter, providing real-time thermal readings.

currentState.title: Current State
currentState.description: Represents the current operational state of the inverter (on/off)

inverterErrorStatus.title: Inverter Error Status
inverterErrorStatus.description: Indicates if there is an error in the inverter system. Returns null when no error is present.

inverterCommand.title: Inverter Command
inverterCommand.description: An action to control the inverter's state (ON/OFF)

llm_td_lst.title: Solar Inverter Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a solar inverter that monitors and controls power generation, including status reporting, current measurements, power readings, temperature sensing, and command capabilities.

inverterStatus.title: Inverter Status
inverterStatus.description: The current status of the inverter, indicating various operational states and fault conditions.

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurement
currentMeasurement.description: Property that exposes the current measurements for three phases (L1, L2, L3) of the inverter.

activePower.title: Active Power
activePower.description: The active power measured by the inverter, representing real power consumption in watts.

reactivePowerMeasurement.title: Reactive Power
reactivePowerMeasurement.description: The reactive power measurement from the inverter, measured in watts.

inverterTemperature.title: Temperature Measurement
inverterTemperature.description: The current temperature reading from the inverter's sensor.

currentState.title: Inverter Current State
currentState.description: The current state of the inverter, indicating whether it is currently active or not.

errorState.title: Error State
errorState.description: Represents the error state of the inverter. When there is no error, it returns null.

inverterCommand.title: Inverter Command
inverterCommand.description: An action to control the inverter's power state. The command can be either ON, OFF, 0, or 1.

base_td.title: Photovoltaic Device
base_td.description: A PV Panel

MaxPressureLoad.title: Maximum Pressure
MaxPressureLoad.description: The maximum mechanical pressure that the panel may endure

MaximumSystemVoltage.title: Maximum System Voltage
MaximumSystemVoltage.description: Maximum System Voltage for which the module is rated

llm_td_lst.title: Device Tracker
llm_td_lst.description: A device tracker that monitors the position and alarm state of a tracked device, with configurable location parameters.

positionAffordance.title: Position
positionAffordance.description: The current position of the device tracker including longitude, latitude and altitude.

deviceAlarmState.title: Device Alarm State
deviceAlarmState.description: Represents the alarm state of a device tracker, which can be triggered or cleared based on certain conditions.

config.title: Config
config.description: A property that exposes the configuration state of the device tracker. This includes the longitude, latitude and radius parameters.

llm_td_lst.title: GPS Device Tracker
llm_td_lst.description: A GPS-enabled tracking device that provides real-time position updates and supports configuration of geographical coordinates with radius settings.

devicePosition.title: Device Position
devicePosition.description: The current position (GPS coordinates) and altitude of the tracked device.

deviceConfig.title: Device Configuration
deviceConfig.description: Configuration settings for device tracking including geographical coordinates and radius.

deviceAlarmEvent.title: Device Alarm
deviceAlarmEvent.description: An event source that asynchronously pushes alarm data to consumers when triggered.

llm_td_lst.title: Device Tracker with Position and Alarm Features
llm_td_lst.description: A device tracker that provides real-time position updates, configuration settings for geographical coordinates and radius, and alarm event notifications.

deviceTrackerPosition.title: Position
deviceTrackerPosition.description: Represents the current position of a device tracker with longitude, latitude and altitude coordinates.

deviceConfig.title: Device Configuration
deviceConfig.description: Configuration settings for the device tracker including geographical coordinates and radius.

deviceAlarmEvent.title: Device Alarm
deviceAlarmEvent.description: An event source that asynchronously pushes alarm events to consumers when triggered.

llm_td_lst.title: Home Assistant Device Tracker
llm_td_lst.description: A device tracker that monitors the position and configuration of a mobile device, with alarm status capabilities.

positionAffordance.title: Position
positionAffordance.description: The current position and altitude of the device tracker.

deviceConfiguration.title: Device Configuration
deviceConfiguration.description: This affordance represents the configuration settings for a device tracker, including its geographical location and tracking radius.

deviceAlarmStatus.title: Device Alarm Status
deviceAlarmStatus.description: Represents the alarm status of a device tracker, indicating whether an alarm has been triggered or not. The null payload suggests that the alarm state is being reset or cleared.

llm_td_lst.title: Device Tracker
llm_td_lst.description: A device tracker that monitors and reports the position of a tracked device, including its geographical coordinates (longitude, latitude, altitude) and alarm status.

positionTracking.title: Position Tracking
positionTracking.description: The device's current position including longitude, latitude and altitude values.

deviceConfig.title: Device Configuration
deviceConfig.description: The configuration settings for the device tracker including geographical coordinates and radius.

deviceAlarmStatus.title: Device Alarm
deviceAlarmStatus.description: An alarm event that indicates a device's alert status. The null payload suggests the absence of an alarm state.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with MQTT connectivity that can be controlled remotely and provides status updates about its operational state, battery level, and various sensors.

vacuumState.title: Vacuum State
vacuumState.description: Represents the current state of the vacuum cleaner. It can be one of several predefined values indicating different operational states.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner, represented as a percentage value.

isVacuumStuck.title: Stuck Status
isVacuumStuck.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is stuck or not. A null value means no issues detected.

binFullStatus.title: Vacuum Bin Full Status
binFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's bin is full or not. A null value indicates that the bin is not full.

isPaused.title: Pause State
isPaused.description: Represents whether the vacuum cleaner is currently paused or not. This is a boolean state that can be read and written.

vacuumControlCommand.title: Vacuum Control Command
vacuumControlCommand.description: This affordance allows sending commands to control the vacuum cleaner's actions such as starting, pausing, returning, stopping, cleaning a spot, or locating it.

llm_td_lst.title: Vacuum Cleaner Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with MQTT communication capabilities, featuring properties for monitoring its state, battery level, and bin full status, as well as actions for controlling its operation through commands like start, pause, return, stop, clean_spot, and locate.

vacuumState.title: Vacuum State
vacuumState.description: The current state of the vacuum cleaner, which can be cleaning, docked, paused, idle, returning, or in an error state.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner as a percentage value.

isVacuumStuck.title: Stuck Status
isVacuumStuck.description: Represents whether the vacuum cleaner is currently stuck. The value 'null' indicates that the vacuum is not stuck.

binFullStatus.title: Bin Full Status
binFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's bin is full or not. The null values suggest that the bin is either empty or the status is unknown.

vacuumCommandAffordance.title: Vacuum Control Command
vacuumCommandAffordance.description: An action affordance that allows controlling the vacuum cleaner by sending various commands such as start, pause, return, stop, clean_spot, and locate.

pauseAffordance.title: Pause Affordance
pauseAffordance.description: This affordance allows to pause or resume the vacuum cleaner's operation. The state can be set to true (paused) or false (resumed).

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with IoT capabilities that can be controlled and monitored remotely. It has various states like cleaning, docked, paused, idle, returning, and error, and provides real-time status updates for battery level, stuck status, bin full status, and pause state.

vacuumState.title: Vacuum State
vacuumState.description: The current state of the vacuum cleaner, indicating its operational status. This includes states like cleaning, docked, paused, idle, returning, and error.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner as a percentage value.

isStuck.title: Stuck Status
isStuck.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is stuck or not. Null indicates no issue.

isBinFull.title: Bin Full Status
isBinFull.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's bin is full or not. A null value indicates no change in status.

pause.title: Pause State
pause.description: Represents the pause state of the vacuum cleaner. When true, the vacuum is paused; when false, it resumes cleaning.

vacuumControlCommand.title: Vacuum Control Command
vacuumControlCommand.description: An action to control the vacuum cleaner's behavior by sending specific commands.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with MQTT connectivity that can be controlled and monitored remotely. It provides status updates on its state, battery level, stuck status, bin full status, and allows for control commands through a pause affordance.

vacuumState.title: Vacuum State
vacuumState.description: The current state of the vacuum cleaner, which can be cleaning, docked, paused, idle, returning, or error.

vacuumBatteryLevel.title: Battery Level
vacuumBatteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner as a percentage.

vacuumStuckStatus.title: Vacuum Stuck Status
vacuumStuckStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently stuck or not. A null value means no stuck status has been reported.

binFullStatus.title: Bin Full Status
binFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's bin is full or not. The value is null when no status has been reported.

vacuumPauseAffordance.title: Pause Affordance
vacuumPauseAffordance.description: This affordance allows to pause or resume the vacuum cleaner's operation. It can be set to true (pause) or false (resume).

vacuumControlCommands.title: Vacuum Control Commands
vacuumControlCommands.description: A set of commands to control the vacuum cleaner's operations

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with various states and capabilities including cleaning, returning to dock, battery monitoring, and command execution.

vacuumState.title: Vacuum State
vacuumState.description: The current state of the vacuum cleaner, which can be one of several predefined values.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner as a percentage value.

isVacuumStuck.title: Stuck Status
isVacuumStuck.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is stuck or not. A null value indicates no issue.

binFullStatus.title: Bin Full Status
binFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's bin is full or not. The status is represented by a boolean value, where 'null' indicates no current status.

isPaused.title: Pause Status
isPaused.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently paused or not. This property can be read to check the current pause status.

vacuumCommandAction.title: Vacuum Command

command.title: Cover Commands

prompts:
Given is the following MQTT message log of an IoT device:


topic: home/cover/pos; payload: OPEN; retain: true
topic: home/cover/pos; payload: CLOSED; retain: true

llm_td_lst.title: Window Blind Cover Device

coverPositionState.title: Cover Position
coverPositionState.description: The current position state of the cover (open or closed)

lightLevelControl.title: Light Level Control
lightLevelControl.description: This affordance controls the light level with three possible states: LOW, MEDIUM, and HIGH.

coverChangeState.title: Cover Change State
coverChangeState.description: This affordance represents the state change events of a cover (e.g., window blind, garage door). It indicates whether the cover is opening or closing.

coverCommand.title: Cover Command
coverCommand.description: An action to open or close the cover.

coverPosition.description: The current position state of the cover (e.g., window blind, garage door). It can be either OPEN or CLOSED.

coverLightLevel.description: The current light level setting of the cover device, which can be LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH.

coverChangeStatus.title: Cover Change Status
coverChangeStatus.description: Describes the current change state of a cover, either opening or closing.

coverCommand.title: Cover Command
coverCommand.description: An action to open or close the cover. This affordance allows consumers to send commands to manipulate the state of the cover.

llm_td_lst.description: A smart cover controller that manages the position and light level settings of a window blind or garage door, with MQTT-based communication.

lightLevelProperty.description: The current light level setting of the cover device, which can be LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH. This property reflects the state of the light and can be read to determine its current value.

coverChangeState.description: Represents the current state change of a cover (e.g., window blind, garage door). It indicates whether the cover is opening or closing.

coverLightLevel.title: Cover Light Level
coverLightLevel.description: The light level setting for the cover, which can be LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH.

coverChangeStatus.title: Cover Change Status
coverChangeStatus.description: The change status of the cover, indicating whether it's opening or closing.

coverControlCmd.title: Cover Control Command
coverControlCmd.description: This affordance allows controlling the cover by sending commands to open or close it.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Cover Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart cover device that can be controlled to open or close, with adjustable light levels and status monitoring capabilities.

coverPosition.title: Cover Position
coverPosition.description: The current position state of the cover (window blind, garage door, etc.) which can be either OPEN or CLOSED. This is a retained property that maintains its last known value.

lightLevelAffordance.title: Light Level Affordance
lightLevelAffordance.description: This affordance represents the light level setting of a cover device, which can be set to LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH.

coverCommand.description: An action to control the cover's position by sending commands to open or close it.

llm_td_lst.title: Alarm Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm device that can be triggered and silenced remotely, with status monitoring capabilities.

alarmStatus.title: Alarm Status
alarmStatus.description: Represents the current state of an alarm, either active (true) or inactive (false)

alarmEvent.description: An event that indicates an alarm has been triggered on the device.

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action

silenceAction.description: An action to silence the alarm on the IoT device. This action takes no input parameters as indicated by the null payload.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Alarm System

alarmProperty.title: Alarm Property
alarmProperty.description: A property that indicates whether an alarm is currently active on the device.

alarmEvent.title: Alarm Event
alarmEvent.description: An event that indicates an alarm state has been triggered on the device.

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action
triggerAction.description: An action that triggers the alarm system.

silenceAction.title: Silence Action
silenceAction.description: An action to silence the alarm on the device

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm system that can be triggered and silenced remotely, with MQTT-based communication for monitoring its state and receiving alarm events.

alarmProperty.title: Alarm Property
alarmProperty.description: A property that indicates whether the alarm is currently active or not.

alarmEvent.title: Alarm Event
alarmEvent.description: An event that indicates an alarm has been triggered on the device.

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action
triggerAction.description: An action to trigger the alarm system. The null payload indicates that no additional parameters are required.

silenceAction.title: Silence Action
silenceAction.description: An action to silence the alarm on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Alarm System Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm system that can be triggered, silenced, and monitored via MQTT. It includes properties for status monitoring and events for state changes.

alarmStatus.title: Alarm Status
alarmStatus.description: Represents the current status of an alarm, which can be either active (true) or inactive (false)

alarmEvent.title: Alarm Event
alarmEvent.description: An event that indicates an alarm state has been triggered on the device.

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action
triggerAction.description: An action that triggers the alarm system.

silenceAction.title: Silence Action
silenceAction.description: An action that allows to silence the alarm on the device. This action does not take any parameters and simply triggers the silencing process.

llm_td_lst.title: Alarm Device
llm_td_lst.description: A device that provides alarm functionality with a boolean property to indicate the alarm state, an event to signal when an alarm occurs, and actions to trigger or silence the alarm.

alarmProperty.title: Alarm Property
alarmProperty.description: A boolean property indicating whether the alarm is currently active or not. The value alternates between true and false, suggesting that it represents a state that can be toggled.

alarmEvent.title: Alarm Event
alarmEvent.description: An event that signals an alarm state has occurred on the device.

triggerAction.title: Trigger Action
triggerAction.description: An action that can be triggered to perform a specific function on the device. The trigger action does not take any parameters as indicated by the null payload.

silenceAlarmAction.title: Silence Action
silenceAlarmAction.description: An action to silence the alarm on the device. This action takes no parameters and returns no value.

llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart LED light bulb that can control color, brightness, and on/off state through MQTT communication.

colorProperty.title: Color Property
colorProperty.description: The color property represents the current color setting of the device. It can be set to various predefined color names.

colorTemperatureProperty.title: Color Temperature Property
colorTemperatureProperty.description: This property represents the color temperature value of the device, measured in Kelvin.

colorMode.title: Color Mode Property
colorMode.description: Represents the current color mode setting of the device, which can be either 'color' or 'temperature'. This property allows reading and writing the color mode state.

levelProperty.title: Level Property
levelProperty.description: The level property represents the brightness or intensity level of the device, ranging from 0 to 100.

onState.title: On State
onState.description: Represents the on/off state of the device, allowing consumers to read or update whether the device is currently active.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Electrical Meter
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart electrical meter that monitors and reports various electrical parameters including instantaneous power, power factor, voltage, current, and frequency.

instantaneousPower.title: Instantaneous Power
instantaneousPower.description: The instantaneous power reading from the device, measured in watts.

instantaneousPowerFactor.title: Instantaneous Power Factor
instantaneousPowerFactor.description: The instantaneous power factor measured by the device, indicating the ratio between real and apparent power.

voltageProperty.title: Voltage Property
voltageProperty.description: Represents the current voltage reading from the device.

current.title: Current
current.description: The current flowing through the electrical circuit in amperes (A). This property represents a measurable quantity that can be read from the device.

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency property represents the electrical frequency measured by the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Energy Meter
llm_td_lst.description: A smart energy meter that monitors electrical power consumption, including instantaneous power, power factor, voltage, current, and frequency measurements.

instantaneousPower.title: Instantaneous Power
instantaneousPower.description: The instantaneous power consumption in watts

instantaneousPowerFactor.title: Instantaneous Power Factor
instantaneousPowerFactor.description: The instantaneous power factor property represents the ratio between real power and apparent power in an AC circuit, indicating how effectively electrical power is being used. It ranges from -1 to 1.

voltageProperty.title: Voltage
voltageProperty.description: The voltage property represents the current electrical potential difference measured in volts.

currentReading.title: Current Reading
currentReading.description: The current property represents the electrical current being measured by the device in amperes.

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency property represents the electrical frequency measured by the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Electrical Meter
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electrical meter that measures and monitors various electrical parameters such as power, voltage, current, frequency, and power factor in real-time.

instantaneousPower.title: Instantaneous Power
instantaneousPower.description: The instantaneous power reading from the device, measured in watts.

instantaneousPowerFactor.title: Instantaneous Power Factor
instantaneousPowerFactor.description: The instantaneous power factor represents the ratio between real power and apparent power, indicating how effectively electrical power is being used.

voltage.title: Voltage
voltage.description: The voltage property represents the electrical potential difference measured in volts.

currentMeasurement.title: Current Measurement
currentMeasurement.description: The current flowing through the device at any given moment, measured in amperes.

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency property represents the electrical frequency in Hz, which is a state of the device that can be read.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Thermostat Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart thermostat that controls heating and cooling operations with temperature sensors and multiple operating modes.

currentTemperature.title: Current Temperature
currentTemperature.description: The current temperature measured by the device, in degrees Celsius.

heatingTargetTemperature.title: Heating Target Temperature
heatingTargetTemperature.description: The target temperature for heating mode in degrees Celsius.

coolingTargetTemperature.title: Cooling Target Temperature
coolingTargetTemperature.description: The target temperature for cooling operations, measured in degrees Celsius.

heatingCoolingMode.title: Heating Cooling Mode
heatingCoolingMode.description: The current mode of the heating and cooling system. Can be set to off, heating, or cooling.

thermostatMode.title: Thermostat Mode
thermostatMode.description: This property represents the current mode of operation for the thermostat. It can be set to 'off', 'heat', 'cool', or 'auto'. The value indicates whether the system is currently operating in heating, cooling, automatic, or off mode.

videoProperty.title: Video Property

streamActive.description: Indicates whether the stream is currently active or not. This property can be read to check the current status and written to toggle the streaming state.

base_td.title: Air Conditioner
base_td.description: An air conditioning unit with temperature control

Goal Temperature.title: AC Goal Temperature
Goal Temperature.description: Indicates temperature the air conditioner aims to reach. When set temperature is reached the air conditioner unit will stop the respective cooling or heating process

status.title: AC Status
status.description: Staus of the device indicating if the device is turned on(True) or off (False)

toggle.title: Toggle Status
toggle.description: Toggles status property, turning the device either off or on depending on the current status

llm_td_lst.title: Air Conditioner Controller
llm_td_lst.description: This classification describes a smart air conditioning system that can be controlled remotely, allowing users to set the desired temperature and toggle the device on or off.

goalTemperature.title: Goal Temperature Setting
goalTemperature.description: This property allows setting the desired temperature for the air conditioning system. It accepts integer values representing degrees.

acStatus.title: Air Conditioner Status
acStatus.description: The current operational status of the air conditioner (on/off)

toggleAC.title: Toggle Air Conditioner
toggleAC.description: An action to toggle the air conditioner on or off.

tempUpAction.title: Temperature Up Action
tempUpAction.description: An action to increase the temperature setting by one degree.

tempDown.title: Decrease Temperature
tempDown.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the air conditioner.

llm_td_lst.title: Air Conditioner Controller

set alarm.description: Sets alarm, ringing or vibration at the set time

toggle vibration mode.description: Switches vibration only mode on or off depending on the current setting.

llm_td_lst.title: Home Security Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart home security alarm system that can be controlled and monitored remotely. It features vibration alerting capabilities and allows for setting, unsetting, and toggling the alarm state.

isSet.title: Alarm State
isSet.description: Indicates whether the alarm is currently set or not. This property can be read to determine the current state and written to change the state.

vibrationEnabled.title: Vibration Enabled Status
vibrationEnabled.description: Represents whether vibration alerting is enabled for the alarm system.

setAlarmAction.title: Set Alarm Action
setAlarmAction.description: An action to set the alarm state. This action takes no input parameters.

alarmUnsetAction.title: Alarm Unset Action
alarmUnsetAction.description: An action to unset the alarm state, which manipulates the state of the Thing by turning off the alarm.

toggleAlarmAffordance.title: Toggle Alarm Affordance
toggleAlarmAffordance.description: An action that toggles the state of the alarm between on and off.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm system that allows users to set, unset and toggle an alarm state. It also includes features for vibration alerts.

isSet.title: Alarm Status
isSet.description: Indicates whether the alarm is currently set or not. This property can be read to check if the alarm is active.

vibrationEnabled.title: Vibration Enabled
vibrationEnabled.description: A property that indicates whether vibration alert is enabled for the alarm

setAlarmAction.title: Set Alarm Action
setAlarmAction.description: An action that sets the alarm state to active. This action does not require any input parameters, as indicated by the null payload in the MQTT message log.

unsetAlarm.title: Unset Alarm Action
unsetAlarm.description: An action to unset the alarm state on the device.

alarmToggle.title: Alarm Toggle
alarmToggle.description: Toggles the alarm state on and off

llm_td_lst.title: Alarm Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm device that can be set, unset, and toggled, with vibration alert capabilities.

isSet.title: Alarm Status Indicator
isSet.description: Indicates whether the alarm is currently set or not. The value can be true (alarm is set) or false (alarm is not set).

alarmVibrationEnabled.title: Alarm Vibration Enabled
alarmVibrationEnabled.description: A property that indicates whether the vibration alert is enabled for the alarm.

alarmSetAction.title: Alarm Set Action
alarmSetAction.description: An action to set the alarm state. This action triggers a process on the Thing that manipulates its state.

unsetAlarmAction.title: Unset Alarm Action
unsetAlarmAction.description: An action to unset the alarm state of the device. This is an interaction that triggers a process on the Thing.

alarmToggle.title: Toggle Alarm
alarmToggle.description: An action to toggle the state of the alarm.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Alarm Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart alarm device that can be set, unset and toggled with vibration alert capabilities

isSet.title: Alarm State Indicator
isSet.description: Indicates whether the alarm is currently set or not. This property reflects the current state of the alarm.

vibrationEnabled.title: Vibration Enabled Status
vibrationEnabled.description: Property indicating whether vibration alert is enabled for the alarm

setAlarm.title: Set Alarm
setAlarm.description: An action to set the alarm state. This action triggers a process on the Thing to activate the alarm.

unsetAlarmAction.title: Unset Alarm Action
unsetAlarmAction.description: An action to unset the alarm state of the device.

alarmToggle.title: Alarm Toggle
alarmToggle.description: An action to toggle the state of the alarm on or off.

llm_td_lst.title: Home Security Alarm System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart home security alarm system that can be set, unset and toggled. It includes features for vibration alerts and MQTT-based control.

isSet.title: Alarm Status
isSet.description: Indicates whether the alarm is currently set or not. This property can be read to check the current state and written to change it.

vibrationEnabled.title: Vibration Enabled
vibrationEnabled.description: A property that indicates whether vibration is enabled for the alarm. It can be read and written, with values being true or false.

setAlarm.title: Set Alarm Action
setAlarm.description: Action to set the alarm state. This action takes no input parameters and triggers the alarm activation.

unsetAlarm.title: Unset Alarm
unsetAlarm.description: An action to unset the alarm state

toggleAlarm.title: Toggle Alarm
toggleAlarm.description: Toggles the current state of the alarm. If the alarm is currently set, it will be unset and vice versa.

llm_td_lst.title: Light Bulb Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart light bulb with controllable brightness and saturation levels, as well as on/off functionality.

stateAffordance.title: State Affordance
stateAffordance.description: This affordance represents the current state of the device, including whether it's on/off and its brightness/saturation levels.

turnOnAction.title: Turn On Action
turnOnAction.description: An action to turn on the device. The payload is null as it's a simple trigger.

turnOffAction.title: Turn Off Action
turnOffAction.description: An action to turn off the device.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: Sets the brightness level of the device

setSaturation.title: Set Saturation
setSaturation.description: Sets the saturation level of the device, which determines how vivid or muted the colors appear. The value ranges from 0 to 255.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Light Bulb
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart light bulb that can be controlled via MQTT messages. The device has properties for current state (on/off, brightness, saturation) and supports actions for turning on/off, setting brightness, and adjusting saturation levels.

currentState.title: State Property
currentState.description: Represents the current state of the device including on/off status, brightness and saturation levels.

turnOn.title: Turn On Action
turnOn.description: Action to turn the device on. This action does not require any input parameters as indicated by the null payload.

turnOffDevice.title: Turn off the device
turnOffDevice.description: An action to turn off the IoT device. This affordance allows consumers to send a command that switches the device into an off state.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: Sets the brightness level of a light source.

setSaturation.title: Set Saturation
setSaturation.description: An action to change the saturation level of a light source.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Light Bulb
llm_td_lst.description: A smart light bulb that can be controlled via MQTT, allowing users to turn it on/off and adjust its brightness and saturation levels.

currentState.title: state
currentState.description: The current state of the device including on/off status and brightness/saturation values.

turnOnAction.title: Turn On Action
turnOnAction.description: An action that turns the device on. The action takes no parameters.

turnOff.title: Turn Off
turnOff.description: An action to turn off the device. This affordance allows consumers to invoke a function that changes the state of the Thing.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to change the brightness level of the device.

setSaturation.title: Set Saturation
setSaturation.description: An action to adjust the saturation level of a light source, which affects the intensity or purity of its color. The saturation value ranges from 0 (grayscale) to 255 (maximum saturation). This interaction allows users to modify the color vibrancy.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Light Bulb
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart light bulb that can be controlled via MQTT. It has properties for state (on/off, brightness, saturation) and actions for turning the light on/off and adjusting brightness/saturation levels.

stateAffordance.title: State Affordance
stateAffordance.description: This is a property affordance that exposes the current state of the device. It includes on/off status and brightness/saturation values.

turnOnLight.title: Turn On Light
turnOnLight.description: Action to turn on the light, triggered by sending a null payload to the 'turn_on' topic.

turnOffAction.title: Turn Off Action
turnOffAction.description: An action to turn off the device. It does not require any parameters as indicated by the null payload.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to set the brightness level of a light source.

setSaturation.title: Set Saturation
setSaturation.description: An action to adjust the saturation level of a light source. This command takes an integer value between 0 and 255.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Light Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart light bulb that can be controlled through MQTT messages. It supports basic operations like turning on/off, adjusting brightness and saturation levels.

deviceState.title: Device State
deviceState.description: Property that represents the current state of the device with on/off status and brightness/saturation values.

turnOnAction.title: Turn On Action
turnOnAction.description: An action to turn on the device. The payload is null as no additional data is needed for this operation.

turnOff.title: Turn off the device
turnOff.description: This action turns off the device, setting its 'on' state to False.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to change the brightness level of the device.

setSaturation.title: Set Saturation
setSaturation.description: An action to set the saturation level of a light source, which affects how vivid or muted the colors appear. This command takes an integer value between 0 and 255.

base_td.title: Bedside Lamp
base_td.description: A bedside lamp with brightness controls

on.title: Lamp Status
on.description: True if Light is turned on

brightness.title: Lamp Brightness
brightness.description: Brightness level of the light in percentage

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Bedside Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart bedside light controller that allows users to control the on/off state and brightness level of a bedside lamp through MQTT messages.

isOnProperty.title: Is On Property
isOnProperty.description: Represents the on/off state of the bedside light

brightnessLevel.title: Bedside Light Brightness
brightnessLevel.description: The brightness level of the bedside light, ranging from 0 to a maximum value (e.g., 100). This property allows reading and setting the current brightness.

turnOnLight.title: Turn On Light
turnOnLight.description: Action to turn the bedside light on. The action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

turnOffBedsideLight.title: Turn Off Bedside Light
turnOffBedsideLight.description: Action to turn off the bedside light

increaseBrightness.title: Increase brightness action
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the bedside light. The payload is null, indicating that no additional parameters are required for this action.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness level of the bedside light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Bedside Light
llm_td_lst.description: A smart bedside light that can be turned on/off and have its brightness adjusted through MQTT commands.

isOn.title: Is On Property
isOn.description: Represents whether the bedside light is currently on or off. This property can be read to get the current state and written to turn the light on or off.

bedsideLightBrightness.title: Bedside Light Brightness
bedsideLightBrightness.description: The brightness level of the bedside light, which can be adjusted to different values.

turnOnBedsideLight.title: Turn On Bedside Light
turnOnBedsideLight.description: An action to turn on the bedside light. The 'on' command is used to switch the light from an off state to an on state.

turnOffLight.title: Turn Off Light
turnOffLight.description: An action to turn off the bedside light by sending a null payload to the 'off' topic

increaseBrightness.title: Increase Brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness level of the bedside light. The null payload indicates that no specific parameters are required for this action.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease Brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the bedside light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Bedside Light
llm_td_lst.description: A smart bedside light that can be turned on/off and have its brightness adjusted remotely.

isOnStatus.title: Is On Status
isOnStatus.description: Represents the current on/off state of the bedside light. This property can be read to determine if the light is currently on or off.

brightnessLevel.title: Light Brightness
brightnessLevel.description: The brightness level of the bedside light, ranging from 0 to 100.

turnOnLight.title: Turn On Light
turnOnLight.description: Action to turn the bedside light on. This is an action because it triggers a state change in the device.

turnOffLight.title: Turn Off Light
turnOffLight.description: Action to turn off the bedside light. This action does not return any data.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase Brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the bedside light.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the bedside light

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Bedside Light
llm_td_lst.description: A smart bedside light with controllable brightness and on/off status

isOnStatus.title: Is On Status
isOnStatus.description: Represents whether the bedside light is currently turned on or off.

brightnessLevel.title: Bedside Light Brightness
brightnessLevel.description: The brightness level of the bedside light, ranging from 0 to 100.

turnOnLight.title: Turn On Light
turnOnLight.description: An action to turn on the bedside light

turnOffLight.title: Turn Off Light
turnOffLight.description: Action to turn off the bedside light. It's an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase Brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness level of the bedside light.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the bedside light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Bedside Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart bedside light that can be turned on/off and have its brightness adjusted through MQTT interactions.

isOnStatus.title: Is On Status
isOnStatus.description: Indicates whether the bedside light is currently turned on or off

brightnessLevel.title: Light Brightness
brightnessLevel.description: The brightness level of the bedside light, which can be adjusted between different values.

turnOnBedsideLight.title: Turn on the bedside light
turnOnBedsideLight.description: This action turns on the bedside light. The message log shows multiple instances where the 'on' topic was published with a null payload, indicating that it's an action trigger rather than a state change or event notification.

turnOffLight.title: Turn Off Light
turnOffLight.description: Action to turn off the bedside light

increaseBrightness.title: Increase Brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness level of the bedside light.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness action
decreaseBrightness.description: An interaction affordance that allows to decrease the brightness level of the bedside light.

base_td.title: Coffee Machine
base_td.description: A coffee machine that can be controlled remotely

water.title: Water Level
water.description: Illustrates water level of the machine. If False the machine does not contain enough water to make a coffIee and needs to be refilled

storage.title: Coffe Ground Waste Bin Status
storage.description: Indicates the remaining coffee ground storage. If False no space is remaining and the container needs to be emptied

on.title: Coffee Machine Status
on.description: Displays the current power state of the machine

toggle.title: Toggle On/Off
toggle.description: Toggles on property of the device

refill.title: Refill Water Tank
refill.description: Refills the water tank of the machine

make coffee.title: Make Coffe
make coffee.description: Creates a medium cup of coffee

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Coffee Machine
llm_td_lst.description: A smart coffee machine that can be monitored and controlled remotely. It has features like water level monitoring, storage compartment status, power state control, and various actions for making coffee, refilling, and emptying.

waterLevelStatus.title: Water Level Status
waterLevelStatus.description: Indicates whether there is water in the coffee machine or not. This property can be read to check the current water level status.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the storage compartment of the coffee machine is full or not. This can be used to monitor the need for emptying the storage.

coffeeMachinePowerState.title: Coffee Machine Power State
coffeeMachinePowerState.description: Represents the power state of the coffee machine, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

toggleCoffeeMachine.title: Toggle Coffee Machine
toggleCoffeeMachine.description: Toggles the state of the coffee machine on or off.

refillCoffeeMachine.title: Refill Coffee Machine
refillCoffeeMachine.description: An action to refill the coffee machine with water or beans.

emptyCoffeeMachine.title: Empty Coffee Machine
emptyCoffeeMachine.description: An action to empty the coffee machine.

makeCoffee.title: Make Coffee
makeCoffee.description: An action to make a cup of coffee using the machine.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Coffee Machine
llm_td_lst.description: A smart coffee machine that can be controlled and monitored remotely through MQTT. It allows checking water levels, storage status, power state, and performing actions like making coffee, refilling, and emptying the storage.

waterLevelStatus.title: Water Level Status
waterLevelStatus.description: Indicates whether there is water in the coffee machine or not.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the storage compartment of the coffee machine is full or not. This property can be read to determine if more space needs to be made available.

coffeeMachinePowerState.title: Coffee Machine Power State
coffeeMachinePowerState.description: Represents the power state of the coffee machine, allowing to read and write its current operational status.

toggleCoffeeMachine.title: Toggle Coffee Machine
toggleCoffeeMachine.description: Toggles the state of the coffee machine on or off. The action takes no input parameters and returns no output.

refillCoffeeMachine.title: Refill Coffee Machine
refillCoffeeMachine.description: An action to refill the coffee machine.

emptyCoffeeMachine.title: Empty Coffee Machine
emptyCoffeeMachine.description: An action to empty the coffee machine storage.

makeCoffee.title: Make Coffee Action
makeCoffee.description: Action to initiate the coffee making process in the coffee machine. This action triggers a sequence of steps within the device, such as heating water and brewing coffee.

llm_td_lst.title: Coffee Machine Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a coffee machine with properties and actions related to its operation, including water level monitoring, power state control, and various actions like making coffee, refilling water, and emptying the machine.

waterLevelIndicator.title: Water Level Indicator
waterLevelIndicator.description: Indicates whether the water level in the coffee machine is sufficient for operation.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the storage compartment of the coffee machine is full or not.

coffeeMachinePowerState.title: Coffee Machine Power State
coffeeMachinePowerState.description: This property represents the power state of the coffee machine. It can be either true (powered on) or false (powered off). The state changes when the device is turned on or off.

toggleCoffeeMachine.title: Toggle Coffee Machine
toggleCoffeeMachine.description: Toggles the power state of the coffee machine on or off.

refillAction.title: Refill Action
refillAction.description: An action to refill the water tank in the coffee machine.

emptyCoffeeMachine.title: Empty Coffee Machine
emptyCoffeeMachine.description: An action to empty the coffee machine. This is indicated by multiple null payloads, suggesting it's a command or trigger rather than a state report.

makeCoffeeAction.title: Make Coffee Action
makeCoffeeAction.description: Triggers the process to make a cup of coffee on the coffee machine.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Coffee Machine
llm_td_lst.description: A smart coffee machine that can be controlled and monitored remotely through MQTT. It has properties to check water status, storage fullness, and power state, as well as actions to toggle the machine on/off, refill it, empty waste containers, and make coffee.

waterStatus.title: Water Status
waterStatus.description: Indicates the current water status in the coffee machine.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the storage of the coffee machine is full or not. This property can be read to check the current status and potentially written to update it.

coffeeMachinePowerState.title: Coffee machine power state
coffeeMachinePowerState.description: Represents the on/off state of the coffee machine

toggleCoffeeMachineState.title: Toggle Coffee Machine
toggleCoffeeMachineState.description: Toggles the state of the coffee machine (on/off)

refillCoffeeMachine.title: Refill Coffee Machine
refillCoffeeMachine.description: An action to refill the coffee machine's water or bean storage.

emptyCoffeeMachine.title: Empty the Coffee Machine
emptyCoffeeMachine.description: An action to empty the coffee machine's waste container or used grounds.

makeCoffeeAction.title: Make Coffee Action
makeCoffeeAction.description: An action to trigger the coffee machine to make a cup of coffee.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Coffee Machine
llm_td_lst.description: A smart coffee machine that can be controlled remotely, featuring water level monitoring, storage status tracking, and various brewing actions.

waterLevelStatus.title: Water Level Status
waterLevelStatus.description: Indicates whether the water level in the coffee machine is sufficient or not.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the storage compartment in the coffee machine is full or not.

coffeeMachinePowerState.title: Coffee Machine Power State
coffeeMachinePowerState.description: Represents the power state (on/off) of the coffee machine. When true, the machine is powered on; when false, it's powered off.

toggleCoffeeMachineState.title: Coffee Machine Toggle
toggleCoffeeMachineState.description: Toggles the state of the coffee machine on or off.

refillCoffeeMachine.title: Refill Coffee Machine
refillCoffeeMachine.description: Triggers the refill process for the coffee machine. This action allows the user to initiate a refill operation.

emptyCoffeeGrounds.title: Empty Coffee Grounds
emptyCoffeeGrounds.description: Action to empty the coffee grounds from the machine

makeCoffee.title: Make Coffee
makeCoffee.description: An action to trigger the coffee making process on the machine.

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Counter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A counter device that can be controlled and monitored via MQTT, featuring properties for tracking count values, events for change notifications, and actions for incrementing, decrementing, and resetting the counter.

count.title: Counter Value
count.description: A property that tracks the current count value of the counter device, which can be read and updated.

countAsImage.title: Counter as Image
countAsImage.description: A property that represents the counter value as an image, with optional fill parameter. The property returns null values.

lastChange.title: Last Change Timestamp
lastChange.description: The timestamp when the counter was last changed.

changeEvent.title: Counter Change Event
changeEvent.description: An event source that asynchronously pushes notifications when the counter value changes.

incrementAction.title: Increment Action
incrementAction.description: An action that increments the counter value by a specified step amount.

decrementStep.title: Decrement the Counter
decrementStep.description: An action to decrease the counter value by a specified step size.

resetCounter.title: Reset Counter
resetCounter.description: Resets the counter to its initial state (zero)

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Counter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A counter device that can increment, decrement, or reset its count value. It exposes properties for the current count and last change timestamp, and provides MQTT-based actions and events to interact with it.

countProperty.title: Count Property
countProperty.description: Represents the current count value of the counter device. This property can be read and potentially written to.

countAsImage.title: Count as Image
countAsImage.description: A property that represents the count value as an image, with optional fill parameter.

lastChange.title: Last Change Timestamp
lastChange.description: The timestamp when the counter was last changed. This property tracks the temporal state of the counter.

changeEvent.title: Counter Change Event
changeEvent.description: An event that indicates when the counter value changes. This event is triggered asynchronously to notify consumers about state changes.

incrementCounterAction.title: Increment Counter Action
incrementCounterAction.description: An action to increment the counter value by a specified step size

decrementAction.title: Decrement Action
decrementAction.description: An action that decreases the counter value by a specified step amount. The step parameter is optional and determines how much to decrease the counter.

resetCounterAction.title: Reset Counter Action
resetCounterAction.description: An action to reset the counter value to zero

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Counter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A counter device that can increment, decrement, and reset its count value. It provides properties for the current count, last change timestamp, and a visual representation of the count as an image.

count.title: Counter Value
count.description: The current count value of the counter device

countAsImage.title: Count as Image Property
countAsImage.description: A property that represents the count value as an image, with optional fill parameter. The payload is always null.

lastChange.title: Last Change Timestamp
lastChange.description: This property represents the last time the counter was modified. It's a timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

changeEvent.title: Counter Change Event
changeEvent.description: An event that signals when the counter value changes.

incrementCounterAction.title: Increment Counter Action
incrementCounterAction.description: An action to increment the counter value by a specified step size. The step parameter is optional and defaults to 1 if not provided.

decrementCounterStep.title: Decrement Counter Action
decrementCounterStep.description: An action that decrements the counter value by a specified step amount. The step parameter is optional and defaults to 1 if not provided.

resetCounter.title: Reset Counter
resetCounter.description: Resets the counter value to zero.

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Counter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A counter device that can be controlled and monitored via MQTT. It allows incrementing, decrementing, and resetting the counter value, while also providing real-time updates of its state through events.

count.title: Counter Value
count.description: The current count value of the counter device. This property represents the state of the counter and can be read to determine its current value.

countAsImageFill.title: Count as Image Property
countAsImageFill.description: A property that represents the count value as an image, with optional fill parameter. The property always returns null in the provided log.

lastChange.title: Last Change Timestamp
lastChange.description: The timestamp when the counter was last changed.

changeEvent.title: Counter Change Event
changeEvent.description: An event that indicates a change in the counter's state. This event is triggered asynchronously when the counter value changes.

incrementCounter.title: Increment Counter
incrementCounter.description: An action to increment the counter value by a specified step. The step parameter is optional and defaults to 1 if not provided.

decrementCounter.title: Decrement Counter
decrementCounter.description: An action that decreases the counter value by a specified step amount.

resetCounter.title: Reset Counter
resetCounter.description: An action to reset the counter value back to zero or its initial state.

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Counter Device
llm_td_lst.description: A counter device that can be controlled and monitored through MQTT messages, allowing users to increment, decrement, reset the counter, and receive notifications when the count changes.

count.title: Counter Value
count.description: Represents the current count value of the counter device. This property can be read to get the current count and written to set a new count.

countAsImage.title: Count as Image
countAsImage.description: A property that represents the count value as an image with optional fill parameter. The property returns null values in the log.

lastChange.title: Last Change Timestamp
lastChange.description: The timestamp when the counter was last changed.

changeEvent.title: Counter Change Event
changeEvent.description: An event that indicates when the counter value has changed.

incrementCounter.title: Increment the Counter
incrementCounter.description: An action that increments the counter by a specified step value. The step parameter is optional.

decrementCounter.title: Decrement Counter
decrementCounter.description: An action to decrease the current count value by a specified step size.

resetCounter.title: Reset Counter
resetCounter.description: This action resets the counter to its initial state.

base_td.title: Dehumidifier
base_td.description: An air dehumidifier with a waste water tank

status.title: Dehumidifier Status
status.description: Boolean value representing the status of the device. If True the device is reachable and able to execute actions

tank.title: Waster Water Tank Level
tank.description: Describes the current state of the waste water tank

humidity.title: Humidity Level
humidity.description: Current humidity level the device aims to reach.

toggle status.title: Toggle On/Off
toggle status.description: Toggle status of the device turning it either on or off

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dehumidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dehumidifier device that can monitor and control humidity levels, with features for tank status monitoring, automatic draining, and remote operation.

status.title: Dehumidifier Status
status.description: Indicates whether the dehumidifier is currently running or not.

tankStatus.title: Dehumidifier Tank Status
tankStatus.description: Indicates whether the dehumidifier's water tank is full or empty.

currentHumidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
currentHumidityLevel.description: The current humidity level measured by the dehumidifier, represented as a numerical value.

toggleStatus.title: Toggle Status
toggleStatus.description: Toggles the status of the dehumidifier, allowing users to turn it on or off.

dehumidifyAction.title: Dehumidify Action
dehumidifyAction.description: An action to start or stop the dehumidification process

drainAction.title: Drain Action
drainAction.description: Action to trigger the draining functionality of the dehumidifier

setHumidityLevel.title: Set Humidity Level
setHumidityLevel.description: Sets the target humidity level for the dehumidifier. Accepts integer values.

llm_td_lst.title: Dehumidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dehumidification system that can monitor and control humidity levels in an environment. It includes features such as status monitoring, tank level reporting, humidity measurement, and various actions to control the device's operation.

dehumidifierStatus.title: Dehumidifier Status
dehumidifierStatus.description: Indicates whether the dehumidifier is currently running or not.

tankStatus.title: Tank Status
tankStatus.description: Reports the current status of the water tank (full or empty)

humidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: The current humidity level measured by the dehumidifier, represented as a numeric value.

toggleStatus.title: Toggle Status
toggleStatus.description: An action to toggle the status of the dehumidifier

dehumidifyAction.title: Dehumidify Action
dehumidifyAction.description: Action to start the dehumidification process on the dehumidifier.

drainAffordance.title: Drain Affordance
drainAffordance.description: An action to drain the water tank of the dehumidifier. The action does not return any value, hence it has a null payload.

setHumidityLevel.title: Set Humidity Level
setHumidityLevel.description: An action to set the desired humidity level in the environment

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dehumidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dehumidifier that can monitor and control humidity levels, with features for tank status monitoring, automatic draining, and remote operation.

status.title: Dehumidifier Status
status.description: Represents the current operational status of the dehumidifier (on/off)

tankStatus.title: Tank Status
tankStatus.description: Reports the current status of the water tank, indicating whether it's full or empty.

humidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: The current humidity level measured by the dehumidifier, represented as a numerical value.

setHumidityLevel.title: Set Humidity Level
setHumidityLevel.description: This property allows setting the desired humidity level for the dehumidifier. The value represents a percentage.

toggleStatus.title: Toggle Status
toggleStatus.description: This appears to be an action affordance that toggles the status of the dehumidifier. The fact that it consistently receives 'null' payloads suggests it's likely used as a trigger or command rather than setting a specific value.

dehumidifyAction.title: Dehumidify Action
dehumidifyAction.description: Triggers the dehumidification process on the device.

drainAction.title: Drain Action
drainAction.description: An action to trigger the draining functionality of the dehumidifier. This affordance allows users to initiate the drainage process.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dehumidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dehumidifier device that can monitor and control humidity levels, manage water tank status, and perform various operations like toggling status, draining the tank, and setting target humidity levels through MQTT communication.

dehumidifierStatus.title: Dehumidifier Status
dehumidifierStatus.description: Represents the operational status of the dehumidifier (on/off)

tankStatus.title: Dehumidifier Tank Status
tankStatus.description: Represents the current state of the dehumidifier's water tank, indicating whether it is full or empty.

humidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: Represents the current humidity level in percentage measured by the dehumidifier's sensor.

toggleStatus.title: Toggle Status Affordance
toggleStatus.description: An action that toggles the status of the dehumidifier. The payload being consistently 'null' suggests it's a trigger-like action rather than one requiring parameters.

dehumidifyAction.title: Dehumidify Action
dehumidifyAction.description: An action to start or stop the dehumidification process. The device sends a null value as a trigger for this action.

drain.title: Drain Action
drain.description: Action to drain the water tank of the dehumidifier

setHumidityLevel.title: Set Humidity Level
setHumidityLevel.description: This action allows setting the target humidity level for the dehumidifier.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dehumidifier Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dehumidifier that can control humidity levels, monitor tank status, and perform various actions like draining and setting desired humidity levels.

status.title: Dehumidifier Status
status.description: A property that indicates whether the dehumidifier is currently running or not.

tankStatus.title: Tank Status
tankStatus.description: Indicates whether the tank is full or empty.

humidityLevel.title: Current Humidity Level
humidityLevel.description: The current humidity level measured by the dehumidifier, ranging from 13 to 59 in the provided log.

toggleStatus.title: Toggle Status
toggleStatus.description: An action to toggle the status of the dehumidifier. This affordance allows users to turn the device on or off.

dehumidifyAction.title: Dehumidify Action
dehumidifyAction.description: This action triggers the dehumidification process on the device.

drainAction.title: Drain Action
drainAction.description: An action to trigger the drain function of the dehumidifier.

setHumidityLevel.title: Set Humidity Level
setHumidityLevel.description: Sets the desired humidity level for the dehumidifier to maintain.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dishwasher
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dishwasher that can be controlled and monitored through MQTT messages. It has properties to check if it's running and the state of its door, and supports actions for opening/closing the door, stopping operation, and simulating a break for testing purposes.

isRunning.title: Is Running
isRunning.description: Indicates whether the dishwasher is currently running or not.

doorState.title: dishwasher door state
doorState.description: Represents whether the dishwasher's door is open or closed.

closeDishwasherDoor.title: Close Dishwasher
closeDishwasherDoor.description: An action to close the dishwasher door

openDishwasherDoor.title: Open Dishwasher
openDishwasherDoor.description: Action to open the dishwasher door

dishwasherStop.title: Stop Dishwasher
dishwasherStop.description: Action to stop the dishwasher's operation immediately.

breakDishwasher.title: Break Dishwasher
breakDishwasher.description: An action to break the dishwasher, likely used for testing or simulation purposes.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dishwasher
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dishwasher with MQTT-based control and monitoring capabilities, featuring door state sensing, operation status tracking, and various control actions for opening, closing, stopping, and simulating malfunctions.

isRunningStatus.title: Is Running Status
isRunningStatus.description: Indicates whether the dishwasher is currently running or not.

dishwasherDoorState.title: Dishwasher Door State
dishwasherDoorState.description: Indicates whether the dishwasher door is currently open or closed

dishwasherClose.title: Close Dishwasher
dishwasherClose.description: Action to close the dishwasher door

dishwasherStopAction.title: Stop Dishwasher
dishwasherStopAction.description: An action to stop the dishwasher's operation immediately.

breakDishwasher.title: Break Dishwasher
breakDishwasher.description: An action to break the dishwasher, which likely simulates a malfunction or error state.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dishwasher
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dishwasher with MQTT-based control and monitoring capabilities, featuring door state sensing, operational status tracking, and various control actions for opening, closing, stopping, and breaking the appliance.

isRunning.title: Is Running Status
isRunning.description: Indicates whether the dishwasher is currently running or not. This property reflects the operational state of the appliance.

dishwasherDoorState.title: dishwasher door status
dishwasherDoorState.description: The dishwasher's door state, indicating whether it is currently open or closed.

closeDishwasherDoor.title: Close Dishwasher
closeDishwasherDoor.description: Action to close the dishwasher door.

dishwasherOpen.title: Open Dishwasher
dishwasherOpen.description: An action to open the dishwasher door. The null payload indicates that no additional data is required for this operation.

dishwasherStop.title: Stop Dishwasher
dishwasherStop.description: An action to stop the dishwasher's operation.

breakDishwasher.title: Break Dishwasher
breakDishwasher.description: An action to break the dishwasher, which sends a null payload when invoked.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dishwasher
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dishwasher with MQTT connectivity that allows monitoring and controlling its door state, running status, and various operations like closing, opening, stopping, and breaking the dishwasher.

isRunningState.title: Is Running State
isRunningState.description: Represents whether the dishwasher is currently running or not

doorState.title: Door State
doorState.description: Represents the state of the dishwasher door (open/closed)

dishwasherClose.title: Close Dishwasher
dishwasherClose.description: Affordance to close the dishwasher door. The null payload indicates a command or action invocation.

openDishwasherDoor.title: Open Dishwasher
openDishwasherDoor.description: Action to open the dishwasher door

dishwasherStop.title: Stop the Dishwasher
dishwasherStop.description: An action to stop the dishwasher operation immediately.

breakDishwasher.title: Break Dishwasher
breakDishwasher.description: This action breaks the dishwasher, causing it to stop functioning.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dishwasher
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dishwasher with IoT capabilities that allows monitoring and controlling its status, door state, and various operations through MQTT messages.

isRunningStatus.title: Is Running Status
isRunningStatus.description: Indicates whether the dishwasher is currently running or not.

dishwasherDoorState.title: Dishwasher Door State
dishwasherDoorState.description: The current state of the dishwasher door, either open or closed.

dishwasherCloseAction.title: Close Dishwasher
dishwasherCloseAction.description: An action to close the dishwasher door. The null payload indicates that no additional data is required for this operation.

dishwasherOpen.title: Open Dishwasher
dishwasherOpen.description: Action to open the dishwasher door. This action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

dishwasherStopAction.title: Stop Dishwasher
dishwasherStopAction.description: An action to stop the dishwasher's operation. This affordance allows consumers to trigger a function that stops any running cycles on the dishwasher.

breakDishwasher.title: Break Dishwasher
breakDishwasher.description: An action to break the dishwasher, likely triggering a fault state or error condition.

base_td.title: MyDispThing
base_td.description: A smart display than can display text, videos, news and web apps.

power.title: Power
power.description: Current power status of the Smart Display

content.title: Available Content
content.description: A list of available content that can be displayed

weatherAlert.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlert.description: The Smart Display can display and warn about weather events

toggle.title: Toggle Power Status
toggle.description: Toggle the Power Status of the Smart Display

setBright.title: Set Brightness
setBright.description: Set the brightness level of the pannel

showText.title: Show Text
showText.description: Display a text file on the Smart Display

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: Start playing a video from the network

presentationWebApp.title: Presentation Web App
presentationWebApp.description: Open and display a preconfigured Web App
