llm_td_lst.title: Digital Signage System
llm_td_lst.description: A digital signage system designed for public spaces, capable of displaying multimedia content and running web applications.

powerStatus.title: Power Status
powerStatus.description: Represents the current power state of the device (on/off)

contentSelection.title: Content Selection
contentSelection.description: This affordance allows selecting different types of media content such as videos, images, text files, and channel information.

weatherAlert.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlert.description: Alerts about weather conditions in different regions.

toggleAction.title: Toggle Action
toggleAction.description: An action to toggle the state of a device or feature.

setVolume.title: Set Volume
setVolume.description: Sets the volume level of the device. This action takes no parameters as indicated by the null payload.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to adjust the brightness level of a display or screen.

showTextAffordance.title: Show Text Affordance
showTextAffordance.description: An action that displays text on the device's screen.

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: An action to play a specific video with given identifier, name, description and URL.

pauseVideoAction.title: Pause Video Action
pauseVideoAction.description: Pauses the currently playing video content on the device.

stopVideo.title: Stop Video
stopVideo.description: An action to stop the currently playing video.

presentationWebApp.title: Launch Web Application
presentationWebApp.description: An action to launch a web application on the device.

launchNewsApp.title: Launch News App
launchNewsApp.description: An action to launch the news application on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Digital Signage Display System
llm_td_lst.description: A digital signage system capable of displaying multimedia content, web applications, and text messages. It features video playback controls, brightness adjustment, volume control, and event logging capabilities.

powerStatus.title: Power Status
powerStatus.description: A property that indicates whether the device is powered on or off.

contentDisplay.title: Content Display
contentDisplay.description: This property represents the current content being displayed on the device. It can be a video, image, text channel, or document.

weatherAlertEvent.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlertEvent.description: An event source that pushes weather alert data to consumers. It provides information about the region and type of weather alert.

toggleAffordance.title: Toggle Affordance
toggleAffordance.description: An action that toggles a state, represented by null payloads in the message log.

setVolumeAction.title: Set Volume Action
setVolumeAction.description: This action allows setting the volume level of an audio output device.

setBright.title: Set Brightness
setBright.description: An action to adjust the brightness level of a display.

showText.title: Show Text Affordance
showText.description: An action to display text on the device's screen. The actual text content is not provided in the payload, suggesting that it might be handled by another mechanism or stored elsewhere.

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: An action to play a specific video content based on the provided identifier, name, description and URL.

pauseVideo.title: Pause Video
pauseVideo.description: An action to pause the currently playing video on the device.

stopVideo.title: Stop Video
stopVideo.description: An action to stop the currently playing video.

presentationWebApp.title: Presentation Web App
presentationWebApp.description: Launches web applications for presentation purposes, such as social media pages or review sites.

launchNewsApp.title: Launch News App
launchNewsApp.description: An action to launch a news application on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart TV Thing Description
llm_td_lst.description: A smart TV with various interactive capabilities

powerStatus.title: Power Status
powerStatus.description: Represents the current power status of the device (on/off)

weatherAlert.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlert.description: An event that describes a weather alert for specific regions

setContent.title: Content Affordance
setContent.description: An affordance that allows to set different types of content (video, picture, text) for display.

toggleSwitch.title: Toggle Switch
toggleSwitch.description: A switch that can be toggled on or off, typically used for binary state control.

setVolume.title: Set Volume
setVolume.description: An action to adjust the volume level of an audio output device.

setBright.title: Set Brightness
setBright.description: Action to adjust the brightness level of a display or screen.

showText.title: Show Text Affordance
showText.description: An action to display text on the device's screen. The payload being null suggests that the actual text content might be managed through other mechanisms or topics.

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: An action to play a specific video content with details like identifier, name, description and URL.

pauseVideo.title: Pause Video
pauseVideo.description: Pauses the currently playing video content on the device.

presentationWebApp.title: Presentation Web App
presentationWebApp.description: Launches a web application for presentation purposes with specific identifier, name, description and URL.

launchNewsApp.title: Launch News App
launchNewsApp.description: An action to launch the news application on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Media Player Device
llm_td_lst.description: A media player device that can play videos, launch web applications and display news

powerStatus.title: Power Status
powerStatus.description: Represents the power status of the device, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

contentSelection.title: Content Selection
contentSelection.description: This property allows the selection of different types of media content to be displayed or played.

weatherAlert.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlert.description: An event that describes a weather alert for a specific region.

toggleAction.title: Toggle Action
toggleAction.description: An action to toggle the state of a device or feature.

setVolume.title: Set Volume
setVolume.description: An action to adjust the volume level of the device.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to adjust the brightness level of a display or lighting system.

showText.title: Show Text Affordance
showText.description: An action that allows displaying text content on the device's display

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: An action that triggers the playback of a video with specified identifier, name, description and URL.

stopVideo.title: Stop Video
stopVideo.description: An action to stop the currently playing video

presentationWebApp.title: Launch Web Application
presentationWebApp.description: An action to launch a specific web application for presentation purposes. The payload contains details about the web application such as identifier, name, description and URL.

launchNewsApp.title: Launch News App
launchNewsApp.description: An action that launches the news application on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Weather Alert System
llm_td_lst.description: A system that provides weather alerts and video playback capabilities

powerStatus.title: Power Status
powerStatus.description: Represents the current power status of the device.

contentProperty.title: Content Property
contentProperty.description: This property represents the current content being displayed or processed by the device. It can be a video, picture, text file, or other media types.

weatherAlertEvent.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlertEvent.description: An event source that asynchronously pushes weather alert data to Consumers. The alerts contain information about the affected region and the type of weather event.

toggleAffordance.title: Toggle Affordance
toggleAffordance.description: An action to toggle the state of a device or component.

setVolume.title: Set Volume
setVolume.description: Action to adjust the volume level of an audio output device.

setBright.title: Set Brightness
setBright.description: This action allows setting the brightness level of a display or lighting system. The null payload indicates that no specific value was provided in these instances.

showTextAction.title: Show Text
showTextAction.description: An action to display text content on the device's screen.

playVideo.title: Play Video
playVideo.description: An action to play a specific video based on the provided identifier, name, description and URL.

pauseVideo.title: Pause Video
pauseVideo.description: Pauses the currently playing video content.

stopVideoAction.title: Stop Video Affordance
stopVideoAction.description: An action to stop the currently playing video on the device.

presentationWebAppAction.title: Presentation Web Application
presentationWebAppAction.description: An action to launch and present a web application with specific identifier, name, description, and URL.

launchNewsApp.title: Launch News App
launchNewsApp.description: An action to launch the news application on the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dryer Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dryer device that can be monitored and controlled remotely through MQTT messages. It tracks the running state, temperature, and storage level of the dryer, and allows actions like starting the dryer, clearing settings, increasing or decreasing parameters.

dryerRunningState.title: Dryer Running State
dryerRunningState.description: Represents whether the dryer is currently running or not. This property can be read to determine if the dryer is active.

dryerTemperature.title: Temperature Sensor
dryerTemperature.description: The temperature sensor measures the current temperature inside the dryer.

storageLevel.title: Storage Level
storageLevel.description: The current storage level of the dryer, measured in some unit (likely percentage or capacity)

startDryer.title: Start the Dryer
startDryer.description: An action to start the dryer. When invoked, it triggers a process on the Thing.

clearAffordance.title: Clear Affordance
clearAffordance.description: An action to clear the dryer's current state or settings.

increaseControl.title: Increase Control
increaseControl.description: An action to increase a parameter on the dryer device. The payload being null suggests it's an invocation without parameters.

decreaseDryerSetting.title: Decrease dryer setting
decreaseDryerSetting.description: An action to decrease a setting on the dryer (e.g., temperature or timer)

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dryer Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dryer appliance that can be monitored and controlled remotely, featuring temperature control, storage monitoring, and operational state management.

dryerRunningState.title: Dryer Running State
dryerRunningState.description: Represents the current running state of the dryer. It can be either true (dryer is running) or false (dryer is not running).

dryerTemperatureReading.title: Temperature Reading
dryerTemperatureReading.description: The current temperature reading of the dryer in degrees Celsius.

dryerStorageLevel.title: Storage Level
dryerStorageLevel.description: The amount of storage available in the dryer, measured as a numeric value.

startDryer.title: Start Dryer
startDryer.description: An action to start the drying process on the dryer. The null payload indicates that no additional parameters are required for this operation.

dryerClear.title: Clear the Dryer
dryerClear.description: An action to clear the dryer, likely resetting its state or removing any errors.

increaseTemperature.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemperature.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the dryer.

decreaseAction.title: Decrease Action
decreaseAction.description: An action to decrease a value in the dryer, likely related to temperature or time settings.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dryer Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description represents a smart dryer device that can be controlled and monitored through MQTT. It includes properties to check the running status, temperature, and storage capacity, as well as actions to start/stop the dryer, clear its state, and adjust the temperature settings.

isDryerRunning.title: Running Status
isDryerRunning.description: Indicates whether the dryer is currently running or not. This property can be read to check the current state and written to start/stop the dryer.

dryerTemperature.title: Dryer Temperature
dryerTemperature.description: The temperature of the dryer in degrees Celsius. The temperature ranges from 55 to 69 degrees.

storageCapacity.title: Storage Capacity
storageCapacity.description: The current storage capacity level of the dryer.

startDryer.title: Start Dryer
startDryer.description: An action to start the dryer's operation. This action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

clearDryer.title: Clear Dryer
clearDryer.description: An action to clear the dryer's state or contents.

increaseTemperature.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemperature.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the dryer

decreaseTemperature.title: Decrease Temperature
decreaseTemperature.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the dryer.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dryer Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dryer that can be monitored and controlled through MQTT messages. It provides properties for checking running status, temperature, and storage level, as well as actions to start the drying process, clear contents, adjust settings, and decrease values.

dryerRunningStatus.title: Dryer Running Status
dryerRunningStatus.description: Indicates whether the dryer is currently running or not. This property can be read to check if the dryer is in operation.

dryerTemperature.title: Temperature Property
dryerTemperature.description: Represents the current temperature of the dryer, which can be read and monitored.

dryerStorageLevel.title: Storage Level
dryerStorageLevel.description: The current storage level of the dryer, indicating how full it is.

startDryer.title: Start Dryer
startDryer.description: An action to start the drying process.

clearDryer.title: Clear Dryer
clearDryer.description: An action to clear the dryer's contents or settings

increaseDryerSetting.title: Increase Dryer Setting
increaseDryerSetting.description: An action to increase a setting on the dryer (e.g., temperature, time). The affordance is invoked by sending a null payload.

decreaseValue.title: Decrease Value
decreaseValue.description: An action to decrease a value, such as temperature or storage level.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Dryer Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart dryer appliance that can be controlled and monitored through MQTT messages, featuring properties for running state, temperature, and storage capacity, along with actions to start the dryer, clear its state, increase or decrease settings.

dryerRunningState.title: Running State
dryerRunningState.description: Represents whether the dryer is currently running or not.

dryerTemperature.title: Temperature Property
dryerTemperature.description: The temperature property represents the current temperature reading from the dryer. It can be read to get the current temperature value.

storageCapacity.title: Storage Capacity
storageCapacity.description: The current storage capacity of the dryer, measured in some unit (likely percentage or volume)

startDryer.title: Start Dryer
startDryer.description: An action to start the dryer appliance.

clearDryerAction.title: Clear Dryer Action
clearDryerAction.description: An action to clear the dryer, likely resetting its state or removing any errors.

increaseDryerSetting.title: Increase Dryer Setting
increaseDryerSetting.description: An action to increase the dryer's setting (e.g., temperature or time)

decreaseAffordance.title: Decrease Affordance
decreaseAffordance.description: An action to decrease the temperature or other settings of the dryer.

base_td.title: Exterior Light
base_td.description: An exterior light with brightness control

status.title: Exterior Light On/Off
status.description: True if Light is turned on

brightness.title: Brightness Level
brightness.description: Brightness level of the light in percentage

llm_td_lst.title: Outdoor Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart controller that manages an exterior light's state and brightness through MQTT communication.

isOn.title: Exterior Light State
isOn.description: Represents the current state (on/off) of the exterior light.

exteriorLightBrightness.title: Exterior Light Brightness
exteriorLightBrightness.description: The brightness level of the exterior light, which can be read and updated.

turnOnExteriorLight.title: Turn On Exterior Light
turnOnExteriorLight.description: Action to turn on the exterior light. The action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

turnOffExteriorLight.title: Turn Off Exterior Light
turnOffExteriorLight.description: An action to turn off the exterior light by sending a null value to the 'off' topic.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the exterior light

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the exterior light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Exterior Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart controller for an exterior light that allows controlling its on/off state and brightness level through MQTT interactions.

isOn.title: Exterior Light On/Off Status
isOn.description: Represents the current on/off state of the exterior light. This property can be read to determine if the light is currently on or off.

exteriorLightBrightness.title: Exterior Light Brightness
exteriorLightBrightness.description: The brightness level of the exterior light, ranging from 0 to 100. This property can be read and written.

turnOnExteriorLight.title: Turn on the exterior light
turnOnExteriorLight.description: This action turns on the exterior light.

turnOffExteriorLight.title: Turn off the exterior light
turnOffExteriorLight.description: An action to turn off the exterior light. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which changes its state.

increaseBrightnessAction.title: Increase brightness action
increaseBrightnessAction.description: An action to increase the brightness of the exterior light. The payload is always null, indicating that it's a simple trigger.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness action
decreaseBrightness.description: An interaction affordance that allows to decrease the brightness of the exterior light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Exterior Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart controller that manages the state and brightness of an exterior light, allowing for remote control through MQTT messages.

isOn.title: Exterior Light State
isOn.description: Represents the current state (on/off) of the exterior light

exteriorLightBrightness.title: Exterior Light Brightness
exteriorLightBrightness.description: The brightness level of the exterior light. It can be read and written.

exteriorLightOn.title: Turn On Exterior Light
exteriorLightOn.description: An action to turn the exterior light on. The payload is null, indicating that no additional data is required for this action.

turnOffExteriorLight.title: Turn Off Exterior Light
turnOffExteriorLight.description: An action to turn off the exterior light by sending a null value to the 'off' topic.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the exterior light.

decreaseLightLevel.title: Decrease Light Level
decreaseLightLevel.description: This action allows the user to decrease the brightness level of the exterior light.

llm_td_lst.title: Exterior Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart exterior light controller that allows turning the light on/off and adjusting its brightness through MQTT communication.

isOnStatus.title: Exterior Light On/Off Status
isOnStatus.description: A property that indicates whether the exterior light is currently turned on or off.

exteriorLightBrightness.title: Exterior Light Brightness
exteriorLightBrightness.description: The current brightness level of the exterior light, ranging from 0 to 100.

turnOnExteriorLight.title: Turn on the exterior light
turnOnExteriorLight.description: An action to turn on the exterior light. This is an interaction that manipulates the state of the device.

turnOffExteriorLight.title: Turn Off Exterior Light
turnOffExteriorLight.description: An action to turn off the exterior light by sending a null value to the 'off' topic.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the exterior light.

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the exterior light.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Exterior Light Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart controller that manages an exterior light, including its state (on/off), brightness level, and provides actions to control these features via MQTT.

isOn.title: Exterior Light State
isOn.description: Represents the current state (on/off) of the exterior light

exteriorLightBrightness.title: Exterior Light Brightness
exteriorLightBrightness.description: The brightness level of the exterior light, ranging from 0 to 100.

turnOnExteriorLight.title: Turn On Exterior Light
turnOnExteriorLight.description: An action to turn on the exterior light. This affordance is invoked by sending a null payload to the 'on' topic, which triggers the device to switch its state to on.

exteriorLightOff.title: Exterior Light Off
exteriorLightOff.description: Action to turn off the exterior light. The action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

increaseBrightness.title: Increase brightness
increaseBrightness.description: An action to increase the brightness of the exterior light

decreaseBrightness.title: Decrease Light Brightness
decreaseBrightness.description: An action to decrease the brightness of the exterior light by a certain amount.

base_td.title: food dispenser
base_td.description: An animal food dispenser that can switch between manual and automatic feeding

automatic.title: Automatic Mode Status
automatic.description: States if the device is set on automatic or manual food dispension

stored.title: Food Available
stored.description: Indicates whether enough food is available for the next dispension process

dispense.title: Dispense Food
dispense.description: Manually dispenses food for the animal

set_state.title: Set Feeding Mode
set_state.description: Sets the feeding bowl to automatic or manual

llm_td_lst.title: Automatic Pet Feeding Bowl
llm_td_lst.description: An IoT-enabled automatic pet feeding bowl that can dispense food automatically or manually, track its storage status, and support refill actions.

automaticEnabled.title: Automatic Feeding Enabled
automaticEnabled.description: A property that indicates whether the automatic feeding functionality is enabled or disabled.

storedStatus.title: Stored Status
storedStatus.description: Indicates whether the feeding bowl has been stored or not. This property can be read to determine if the bowl is currently in storage.

feedingBowlAutomaticMode.title: Automatic Feeding Mode
feedingBowlAutomaticMode.description: This property determines whether the feeding bowl operates in automatic or manual mode. It can be set to either 'manual' or 'automatic', indicating how the device should dispense food.

dispenseAction.title: Dispense Action
dispenseAction.description: Triggers the dispensing action on the feeding bowl, allowing food to be released.

refillAffordance.title: Refill Affordance
refillAffordance.description: This affordance allows the user to trigger a refill action for the feeding bowl. It's an event that can be invoked to start the refilling process.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Pet Feeder
llm_td_lst.description: An IoT-enabled automatic pet feeding bowl that allows remote monitoring and control of pet feeding, including features for dispensing food, refilling the bowl, and switching between manual and automatic feeding modes.

automaticFeedingEnabled.title: Automatic Feeding Enabled
automaticFeedingEnabled.description: A property that indicates whether the automatic feeding mode is enabled on the device.

storedStatus.title: Stored Status
storedStatus.description: Indicates whether the feeding bowl has been stored or not. This property can be read and updated.

feedingBowlAutomaticMode.title: Automatic Feeding Mode
feedingBowlAutomaticMode.description: This affordance allows switching between manual and automatic feeding modes.

dispenseFood.title: Dispense Action
dispenseFood.description: An action to dispense food from the automatic feeding bowl.

refill.title: Refill Action
refill.description: Action to refill the feeding bowl with food. The action is triggered by sending a message, but no specific data is required (hence null payload).

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Pet Feeding Bowl
llm_td_lst.description: A smart pet feeding bowl with automatic dispensing, manual control options and storage status monitoring capabilities.

automaticEnabled.title: Automatic Feeding Enabled
automaticEnabled.description: Enables or disables the automatic feeding functionality of the feeding bowl.

isStored.title: Stored Status
isStored.description: Indicates whether the feeding bowl has been stored or not.

dispenseAction.title: Dispense Action
dispenseAction.description: An action to dispense food from the feeding bowl. The action is triggered when needed and does not require a specific value.

refillFeedingBowl.title: Refill Action
refillFeedingBowl.description: Action to refill the feeding bowl.

setAutomaticMode.title: Automatic Feeding Mode
setAutomaticMode.description: An action to switch between manual and automatic feeding modes for the pet feeding bowl.

llm_td_lst.title: Automatic Pet Feeding Bowl
llm_td_lst.description: A smart pet feeding bowl that supports automatic and manual feeding modes, with features for dispensing food and tracking storage status.

automaticEnabled.title: Automatic Feeding Enabled
automaticEnabled.description: Enables or disables the automatic feeding functionality of the bowl.

storedStatus.title: Stored Status
storedStatus.description: Indicates whether the feeding bowl has been stored or not. This property can be read and written to track the storage status.

automaticFeedingMode.title: Automatic Feeding Mode
automaticFeedingMode.description: Determines whether the feeding bowl operates in automatic or manual mode.

dispenseFood.title: Feeding Bowl Dispense Action
dispenseFood.description: Action to trigger the dispensing mechanism of the feeding bowl, allowing food to be released.

refillAction.title: Refill Action
refillAction.description: An action to refill the feeding bowl.

llm_td_lst.title: Automatic Pet Feeding Bowl
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models an automatic pet feeding bowl that can dispense food, be refilled, and operate in either manual or automatic mode. It includes features for monitoring the feeding status and controlling the dispensing mechanism.

automaticEnabled.title: Automatic Feeding Enabled
automaticEnabled.description: Determines whether the automatic feeding feature is enabled or disabled for the feeding bowl.

feedingBowlStoredStatus.title: Feeding Bowl Stored Status
feedingBowlStoredStatus.description: Indicates whether the feeding bowl has been stored or not. This property can be read to check if the bowl is currently in storage.

automaticFeedingMode.title: Automatic Feeding Mode
automaticFeedingMode.description: This affordance allows the device to switch between automatic and manual feeding modes.

dispenseFood.title: Feeding Bowl Dispense Action
dispenseFood.description: An action to dispense food from the feeding bowl. The action takes no parameters and returns no value, as indicated by the null payload.

refillAction.title: Refill Action
refillAction.description: An action to trigger the refill process of the feeding bowl.

base_td.title: kettle

heat.title: Start Boiling
heat.description: Start the heating process of the kettle

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Kettle Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart kettle that can be controlled via MQTT, allowing for power state management, water level monitoring, and heating control.

kettlePowerState.title: Kettle Power State
kettlePowerState.description: Represents the current power state of the kettle, which can be either on or off.

isFilledStatus.title: Kettle Fill Status
isFilledStatus.description: Indicates whether the kettle is currently filled with water or not.

switchPower.title: Switch Power
switchPower.description: An action to switch the power state of the kettle. The payload being consistently 'null' suggests that this is a command or trigger rather than a property or event.

heatControlAction.title: Heat Control
heatControlAction.description: An action to control the heating function of the kettle. The null payload indicates that it's a trigger or command rather than a state value.

fillKettle.title: Fill Kettle
fillKettle.description: An action to fill the kettle with water.

emptyKettleAction.title: Empty Kettle Action
emptyKettleAction.description: An action to empty the kettle. This affordance allows users to trigger the process of emptying the kettle.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Kettle
llm_td_lst.description: A smart kettle with power control, water level monitoring, and various actions for heating, filling, and emptying the kettle.

kettlePowerState.title: Kettle Power Switch
kettlePowerState.description: This property represents the power state of the kettle, which can be either on or off. It allows reading and writing the current power status.

isFilled.title: Kettle Fill Status
isFilled.description: Indicates whether the kettle is filled with water or not. This property can be read to check if there's water in the kettle.

switchPower.title: Switch Power Affordance
switchPower.description: An action to switch the power state of the kettle. This affordance allows users to turn the kettle on or off.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to control the heating function of the kettle. The 'null' payloads indicate that this is an action invocation rather than a property state or event notification.

fillKettle.title: Fill the Kettle
fillKettle.description: This action allows to fill the kettle with water.

emptyKettle.title: Empty Kettle Action
emptyKettle.description: An action to empty the kettle

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Kettle
llm_td_lst.description: A smart electric kettle with controllable power, water level monitoring, and heating functions.

powerSwitch.title: Power Switch
powerSwitch.description: The power switch controls whether the kettle is turned on or off. It can be either true (on) or false (off).

isFilledStatus.title: Kettle Water Level Status
isFilledStatus.description: Indicates whether the kettle has water in it or not. This property can be read to determine if the kettle needs refilling.

switchPower.title: Switch Power Affordance
switchPower.description: An action to switch the power state of the kettle on or off.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to control the heating function of the kettle. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state.

fillKettle.title: Fill Kettle
fillKettle.description: An action to fill the kettle with water. This action does not return any data, hence it's represented as a null type.

emptyKettle.title: Empty Kettle
emptyKettle.description: Action to empty the kettle. When invoked, it triggers a process on the Thing to drain the water.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Kettle
llm_td_lst.description: A smart kettle with MQTT-based control and monitoring capabilities, featuring power switching, water level sensing, heating control, and filling/emptying actions.

powerSwitch.title: Power Switch
powerSwitch.description: A property that represents the current power state of the kettle. It can be either on (true) or off (false). This affordance allows reading and writing the power state.

isFilled.title: Kettle Filled Status
isFilled.description: Represents whether the kettle is currently filled with water or not. This property can be read to determine if there's enough water for operation.

switchPower.title: Switch Power
switchPower.description: An action to switch the power state of the kettle on or off. This affordance allows users to control the kettle's power.

heat.title: Heat Control
heat.description: An action to control the heating function of the kettle.

fillKettleAction.title: Fill Kettle Action
fillKettleAction.description: An action to fill the kettle with water. This action is invoked by sending a null value to the 'kettle/fill' topic.

kettleEmptyAction.title: Empty Kettle Action
kettleEmptyAction.description: An action to empty the kettle

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Kettle Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart kettle with controllable power, heating, and water level management capabilities.

powerSwitch.title: Power Switch
powerSwitch.description: A property that represents the power state of the kettle, which can be turned on or off.

isFilled.title: Kettle Fill Status
isFilled.description: Represents the current fill status of the kettle, indicating whether it contains water or not.

switchPower.title: Switch Power Affordance
switchPower.description: This affordance allows to toggle the power state of the kettle. The null payload indicates that it's an action that doesn't require any parameters.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to control the heating function of the kettle.

fillKettle.title: Fill Kettle
fillKettle.description: An action to fill the kettle with water.

emptyKettle.title: Empty Kettle
emptyKettle.description: An action to empty the kettle

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Oven Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart oven controller that provides properties and actions to monitor and control the state of an oven, including its on/off status, heating method, and preheating functionality.

ovenOnState.title: Oven On/Off State
ovenOnState.description: Represents the current state of whether the oven is on or off. This property can be read to determine if the oven is currently operating.

heatingMethod.title: Oven Heating Method
heatingMethod.description: The heating method property of the oven, which can be either 'convection' or 'top_and_bottom'. This property represents the current state of the oven's heating method.

switchOnOven.title: Switch On Oven
switchOnOven.description: An action to turn the oven on. The payload being 'null' indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

switchOffOven.title: Switch Off Oven
switchOffOven.description: Action to switch off the oven. This action triggers a process on the Thing (oven) which changes its state from on to off.

changeHeatingMethod.title: Change Heating Method
changeHeatingMethod.description: An action to change the heating method of the oven. The previous messages show that the oven can be set to different heating methods like 'convection' and 'top_and_bottom'. This action allows switching between these modes.

preheatOven.title: Preheat the Oven
preheatOven.description: An action to preheat the oven. This function can be invoked to start the preheating process.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Oven
llm_td_lst.description: A smart oven with controllable heating methods and power states, capable of preheating and switching between different operational modes.

ovenOn.title: Oven On/Off Switch
ovenOn.description: A property that indicates whether the oven is turned on or off. It can be read to check the current state and written to toggle the oven's power.

ovenHeatingMethod.title: Oven Heating Method
ovenHeatingMethod.description: The heating method setting of the oven, which can be either convection or top and bottom heating.

ovenSwitchOn.title: Switch On Oven
ovenSwitchOn.description: Action to switch on the oven

switchOffOven.title: Switch Off Affordance
switchOffOven.description: An action that allows the consumer to switch off the oven. This is an interaction affordance that manipulates state by turning off the device.

changeHeatingMethod.title: Change Heating Method
changeHeatingMethod.description: An action to change the heating method of the oven. The method can be set to different modes like convection or top_and_bottom.

preheatOvenAction.title: Preheat Oven Action
preheatOvenAction.description: An action to preheat the oven. When invoked, it triggers the preheating process.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Oven Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart oven controller that allows remote control and monitoring of an oven, including turning it on/off, changing heating methods (convection or top-and-bottom), and preheating functionality.

ovenOnState.title: Oven On State
ovenOnState.description: Represents the on/off state of the oven. This property can be read to determine if the oven is currently on or off, and it can also be written to turn the oven on or off.

heatingMethod.title: Heating Method Property
heatingMethod.description: Property that indicates the current heating method of the oven, which can be either 'convection' or 'top_and_bottom'

switchOn.title: Switch On Affordance
switchOn.description: An action to switch on the oven. The null payload indicates that no additional parameters are needed for this action.

switchOffOven.title: Switch Off Oven
switchOffOven.description: An action to turn off the oven. This affordance, when invoked, will switch the oven from an on state to an off state.

changeHeatingMethod.title: Change Heating Method
changeHeatingMethod.description: An action to change the heating method of the oven, such as switching between convection and top-and-bottom heating.

preheat.title: Preheat the oven
preheat.description: An action to preheat the oven

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Oven
llm_td_lst.description: A smart oven with controllable heating methods and power state, capable of preheating and switching on/off via MQTT commands.

ovenOnState.title: Oven Power State
ovenOnState.description: Represents the on/off state of the oven. This property can be read to determine if the oven is currently powered on or off, and written to toggle the power state.

ovenHeatingMethod.title: Oven Heating Method
ovenHeatingMethod.description: Describes the current heating method setting of the oven. The value can be either 'convection' or 'top_and_bottom'. This property reflects the state of the oven's heating configuration.

switchOnOven.title: Switch On Oven
switchOnOven.description: Action to switch on the oven. The action takes no parameters and returns nothing (null).

ovenSwitchOff.title: Switch Off Oven
ovenSwitchOff.description: An action to switch off the oven by sending a null command.

changeHeatingMethod.title: Change Heating Method
changeHeatingMethod.description: An action to change the heating method of the oven. The null payload suggests that it might be a trigger for an internal process or state change.

preheatOven.title: Preheat Oven
preheatOven.description: Action to preheat the oven. When invoked, it triggers a process on the Thing (e.g., heating up the oven to a certain temperature).

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Oven Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart oven controller that allows users to control and monitor the state of an oven, including switching it on/off, changing heating methods, and triggering preheating functions.

ovenOnState.title: Oven On/Off Switch
ovenOnState.description: This affordance represents the on/off state of the oven, allowing users to turn it on or off.

heatingMethod.title: Heating Method
heatingMethod.description: The current heating method used by the oven. It can be either 'convection' or 'top_and_bottom'.

switchOn.title: Switch On Affordance
switchOn.description: This affordance allows to switch the oven on. It appears as an action that can be invoked by sending a null payload.

switchOffOven.title: Switch Off Oven
switchOffOven.description: An action to switch off the oven by sending a null command.

changeHeatingMethod.title: Change Heating Method
changeHeatingMethod.description: An action to change the heating method of the oven. The payload being null indicates that this is a command or trigger without any additional data.

preheatOven.title: Preheat Function
preheatOven.description: An action that triggers the preheating process of the oven.

base_td.title: Popcorn maker
base_td.description: A popcorn making appliance

power.title: Popcorn Maker Power Status
power.description: True if machine is turned on and ready for use

toggle.title: Toggle On/Off
toggle.description: Turns the device on or off based on the current state

add corn.title: Add Corn
add corn.description: Adds corn to the heating section of the maker

add sugar.title: Add Sugar
add sugar.description: Adds sugar to the heating section making the popcorn sweet

add salt.title: Add Salt
add salt.description: Adds salt to the heating section making the popcorn salty

heat.title: Start Popcorn Maker
heat.description: Start heating up the heating section, turning added corn into popcorn

llm_td_lst.title: Popcorn Maker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart popcorn maker that allows remote control of its various functions including toggling power, adding corn kernels, sugar, salt, and controlling heat through MQTT communication.

popcornMakerState.title: Popcorn Maker State
popcornMakerState.description: Indicates whether the popcorn maker is currently active or not. The state alternates between true and false, suggesting it represents an on/off state.

togglePopcornMaker.title: Popcorn Maker Toggle
togglePopcornMaker.description: An action to toggle the state of the popcorn maker on or off.

addCorn.title: Add Corn
addCorn.description: An action to add corn kernels to the popcorn maker, triggered by sending a null value to the topic.

addSugar.title: Add Sugar Affordance
addSugar.description: An action to add sugar to the popcorn maker. This affordance allows users to trigger the addition of sugar to the popcorn making process.

addSalt.title: Add Salt
addSalt.description: This action allows adding salt to the popcorn maker.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to trigger the heating mechanism in the popcorn maker.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Popcorn Maker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart popcorn maker with various controls including state monitoring, corn addition, seasoning options (salt and sugar), heat control, and toggle functionality.

popcornMakerState.title: Popcorn Maker State
popcornMakerState.description: Represents the current state (on/off) of the popcorn maker device.

togglePopcornMaker.title: Toggle Popcorn Maker
togglePopcornMaker.description: Toggles the popcorn maker on and off.

addCornAffordance.title: Add Corn Affordance
addCornAffordance.description: This affordance allows the user to add corn kernels to the popcorn maker.

addSugarAction.title: Add Sugar Action
addSugarAction.description: An action to add sugar to the popcorn maker. The 'null' payload indicates that no additional data is needed for this action.

addSalt.title: Add Salt Affordance
addSalt.description: An action to add salt to the popcorn maker. The action is triggered by sending a null message.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to control the heat level in the popcorn maker.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Popcorn Maker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart popcorn making device that allows users to control the heating process, add ingredients like corn kernels, sugar, and salt, and toggle its state via MQTT messages.

popcornMakerState.title: Popcorn Maker State
popcornMakerState.description: Represents the current state (on/off) of the popcorn maker device.

togglePopcornMaker.title: Popcorn Maker Toggle
togglePopcornMaker.description: An action to toggle the popcorn maker on or off, represented by a null payload in the MQTT message log.

addCorn.title: Add Corn
addCorn.description: An action to add corn kernels to the popcorn maker. This affordance allows users to trigger the process of adding corn.

addSugar.title: Add Sugar Affordance
addSugar.description: An action to add sugar to the popcorn maker.

addSalt.title: Add Salt
addSalt.description: An action to add salt to the popcorn maker.

heatAffordance.title: Heat Affordance
heatAffordance.description: An action to trigger the heating process in the popcorn maker.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Popcorn Maker
llm_td_lst.description: A smart popcorn maker with IoT capabilities that allows remote control of various functions including power state, adding ingredients (corn, sugar, salt), and heat control through MQTT protocol.

popcornMakerPowerState.title: Popcorn Maker Power State
popcornMakerPowerState.description: Represents the power state of the popcorn maker, which can be either on (true) or off (false)

popcornMakerToggle.title: Popcorn Maker Toggle
popcornMakerToggle.description: An action to toggle the popcorn maker on or off.

addCorn.title: Add Corn
addCorn.description: An action to add corn kernels to the popcorn maker. This is an interaction that triggers a process on the Thing.

addSugarAffordance.title: Add Sugar Affordance
addSugarAffordance.description: An action to add sugar to the popcorn maker. The 'null' payload indicates that no additional parameters are required for this action.

addSalt.title: Add Salt Affordance
addSalt.description: An action that allows adding salt to the popcorn maker. This action doesn't return a value, as indicated by the null payload.

heatControl.title: Heat Control
heatControl.description: An action to control the heating function of the popcorn maker.

llm_td_lst.title: Popcorn Maker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart popcorn maker that can be controlled via MQTT messages, featuring actions to toggle power state, add corn kernels, sugar, and salt, as well as control heating process.

popcornMakerPowerState.title: Popcorn Maker Power State
popcornMakerPowerState.description: Represents the current power state (on/off) of the popcorn maker. The value alternates between true and false, indicating the device being turned on and off.

togglePopcornMaker.title: Toggle Affordance
togglePopcornMaker.description: An action that toggles the state of the popcorn maker on or off. This can be inferred from the topic 'popcorn_maker/toggle' and the null payload, which suggests it's a command rather than a state update.

addCorn.title: Add Corn Affordance
addCorn.description: An action to add corn kernels to the popcorn maker

addSugar.title: Add Sugar Affordance
addSugar.description: An action to add sugar to the popcorn maker

addSalt.title: Add Salt Affordance
addSalt.description: An action to add salt to the popcorn maker. The affordance receives a trigger signal (null payload) to perform the salt addition.

heatControlAction.title: Heat Control
heatControlAction.description: An action to trigger the heating process in the popcorn maker.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Camera Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart camera device that supports recording functionality, storage management, and remote control capabilities through MQTT protocol.

isRecordingStatus.title: Recording Status
isRecordingStatus.description: Represents the current recording state of the camera. True indicates that the camera is currently recording, while False means it is not.

cameraStorageCapacity.title: Camera Storage Capacity
cameraStorageCapacity.description: The storage capacity of the camera in bytes, which can be read and updated by consumers.

startRecording.title: Start Recording
startRecording.description: An action to start the recording functionality on the camera device.

stopRecording.title: Stop Recording
stopRecording.description: This action stops the current recording session on the camera.

deleteRecord.title: Delete Record
deleteRecord.description: An action to delete a recorded video from the camera's storage.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Camera Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart camera that supports recording, storage management and real-time status monitoring.

isRecordingStatus.title: Is Recording Status
isRecordingStatus.description: Indicates whether the camera is currently recording or not.

cameraStorageLevel.title: Camera Storage Level
cameraStorageLevel.description: Represents the current storage level of the camera device. The value indicates how much storage space is available or used.

startRecordingAction.title: Start Recording Action
startRecordingAction.description: An action to start recording on the camera device. This is indicated by multiple 'null' payloads being sent to the record topic.

stopRecording.title: Stop Recording
stopRecording.description: An action to stop the recording process on the camera device. This affordance allows consumers to trigger a function that stops the current recording session.

deleteRecording.title: Delete Recording
deleteRecording.description: An action to delete a recording from the camera storage.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Camera Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart camera device that supports recording, storage monitoring, and video management features

isRecording.title: Is Recording
isRecording.description: A property that indicates whether the camera is currently recording or not

cameraStorageCapacity.title: Camera Storage Capacity
cameraStorageCapacity.description: Represents the current storage capacity of the camera device, measured in bytes. This property allows consumers to monitor available storage space.

startRecordingAction.title: Start Recording
startRecordingAction.description: An action to start the recording process on the camera device. When invoked, it triggers the recording functionality.

stopRecording.title: Stop recording
stopRecording.description: Action to stop the current video recording on the camera device. This action takes no parameters and returns no value, indicated by a null payload.

deleteRecord.title: Delete Record Affordance
deleteRecord.description: An action to delete a recorded video file from the camera's storage

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Camera Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart camera device that supports recording, storage management, and video deletion capabilities through MQTT communication protocol

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the camera is currently recording or not. This property can be read to check the current status and updated to start or stop recording.

cameraStorageCapacity.title: Camera Storage Capacity
cameraStorageCapacity.description: Represents the current storage capacity of the camera in bytes. This property can be read to determine how much storage space is available.

startRecording.title: Record Video
startRecording.description: Starts recording a video on the camera device.

cameraRecordStop.title: Stop Recording
cameraRecordStop.description: An action that stops the recording process on the camera device.

deleteRecording.title: Delete Recording
deleteRecording.description: An action to delete a recording from the camera storage.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Camera Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart camera device capable of recording video, managing storage capacity, and providing various control actions for recording management.

isRecordingStatus.title: Recording Status
isRecordingStatus.description: Indicates whether the camera is currently recording or not. This property reflects the current state of the camera's recording functionality.

storageCapacity.title: Storage Capacity
storageCapacity.description: The current storage capacity available on the camera device, measured in bytes or other appropriate units.

startRecording.title: Start Recording
startRecording.description: An action to start recording on the camera device. This is indicated by multiple null payloads sent to the 'camera/record/record' topic.

stopRecordingAction.title: Stop Recording Action
stopRecordingAction.description: An action to stop the current recording session on the camera device. This affordance allows users to trigger a function that stops the ongoing video capture.

deleteRecord.title: Delete Record
deleteRecord.description: An action to delete a recorded video from the camera storage.

llm_td_lst.title: Heater Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart heater device that can be controlled remotely, featuring temperature adjustment and on/off functionality.

heaterLevel.title: Heater Level
heaterLevel.description: The current level setting of the heater.

heaterStatus.title: Heater Status
heaterStatus.description: Status property indicating whether the heater is currently active or inactive.

turnOnHeater.title: Turn On Heater
turnOnHeater.description: An action to turn on the heater.

turnOffHeater.title: Turn Off Heater
turnOffHeater.description: An action to turn off the heater. This affordance allows consumers to send a command to deactivate the heating functionality.

increaseTemp.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemp.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the heater by one level.

decreaseTemp.title: Decrease Temperature
decreaseTemp.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the heater by one level.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Heater Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart heater device that can be controlled remotely to adjust temperature settings and operational status.

heaterLevel.title: Heater Level
heaterLevel.description: The current level setting of the heater, ranging from 0 to 5.

heaterStatus.title: Heater Status
heaterStatus.description: The current operational status of the heater, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

turnOnHeater.title: Turn On Heater
turnOnHeater.description: An action to turn on the heater device.

heaterTurnOff.title: Turn Off Heater
heaterTurnOff.description: An action to turn off the heater.

increaseTemp.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemp.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the heater.

decreaseTemp.title: Decrease Temperature
decreaseTemp.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the heater.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Heater Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart heater controller that allows remote control of a heating device through MQTT commands. It provides properties to monitor the current heater level and status, as well as actions to turn the heater on/off and adjust its temperature settings.

heaterLevel.title: Heater Level
heaterLevel.description: The current level setting of the heater, ranging from 0 to 5.

heaterStatus.title: Heater Status
heaterStatus.description: Represents the current operational state of the heater (on/off).

turnOnHeater.title: Turn On Heater
turnOnHeater.description: An action to turn on the heater. The payload is null, indicating that no additional data is required for this action.

turnOffHeater.title: Turn Off Heater
turnOffHeater.description: Action to turn off the heater. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state.

increaseTemp.title: Increase Temperature Action
increaseTemp.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the heater. This action does not return any data, hence the null payload.

decreaseTemp.title: Decrease Temperature
decreaseTemp.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the heater

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Heater Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart heating device that allows control over temperature settings and on/off status through MQTT messages.

heaterLevel.title: Heater Level Control
heaterLevel.description: Represents the current level setting of the heater, which can be read and updated.

heaterStatus.title: Heater Status
heaterStatus.description: Indicates whether the heater is currently turned on or off.

turnOnHeater.title: Turn On Heater
turnOnHeater.description: An action to turn on the heater. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state.

turnOffHeater.title: Turn off the heater
turnOffHeater.description: An action to turn off the heater device, represented by a null payload in the MQTT message.

increaseTemp.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemp.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the heater.

decreaseTemp.title: Decrease Temperature
decreaseTemp.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the heater.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Heater Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart heating device that allows control over heater status and temperature settings through MQTT interactions.

heaterLevel.title: Heater Level
heaterLevel.description: The current heating level setting of the device, ranging from 0 to 5.

heaterStatus.title: Heater Status
heaterStatus.description: The current status (on/off) of the heater

turnOnHeater.title: Turn on the heater
turnOnHeater.description: An action to turn on the heater. The payload is null, which indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

turnOffHeater.title: Turn Off Heater
turnOffHeater.description: An action to turn off the heater. This affordance allows consumers to invoke a function that turns off the heater.

increaseTemp.title: Increase Temperature
increaseTemp.description: An action to increase the temperature setting of the heater.

decreaseTempAction.title: Decrease Temperature Action
decreaseTempAction.description: An action to decrease the temperature setting of the heater by one level. This is an interaction that triggers a process on the Thing.

base_td.title: Smart Lock
base_td.description: A lock that can be monitored, locked and unlocked remotely

locked.title: Locking Mechanism Status
locked.description: Property stating if the locked is currently locked(True) or unlocked(False)

lock.title: Lock
lock.description: Locks the lock securing connected objects

unlock.title: Unlock
unlock.description: Unlocks the lock making connected objects accessible.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Lock Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock controller that manages the locking and unlocking mechanism of a door or other secure entry point, with MQTT communication capabilities.

lockState.title: Lock State
lockState.description: Represents the current state of the lock (locked/unlocked)

performLockAction.title: Lock Action
performLockAction.description: An action that locks the device. The topic 'lock/lock' indicates a command to perform locking, and the null payload suggests it's an action invocation rather than a state change.

unlockLock.title: Unlock the Lock
unlockLock.description: An action to unlock the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Lock Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock device that can be controlled remotely through MQTT protocol, allowing locking and unlocking actions.

lockState.title: Lock State
lockState.description: Represents the current state of the lock (locked or unlocked)

lockAction.title: Lock action
lockAction.description: This affordance represents the ability to lock a device. The payload being 'null' indicates that it's an action that doesn't require additional parameters.

unlockAction.title: Unlock Action
unlockAction.description: An action to unlock the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Lock Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock device that can be controlled remotely to lock and unlock, with status monitoring capabilities

lockStatus.title: Lock Status
lockStatus.description: Represents the current state of the lock, which can be either locked (true) or unlocked (false)

lockAction.title: Lock Action
lockAction.description: An action that locks the device. The null payloads indicate no return value.

unlockDevice.title: Lock Unlock Action
unlockDevice.description: Action to unlock the device. The null payload indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Lock Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock device that can be controlled remotely through MQTT messages, allowing users to check the current state of the lock and perform locking and unlocking actions.

lockState.title: Lock State
lockState.description: The current state of the lock, whether it is locked or unlocked.

unlockAction.title: Unlock Action
unlockAction.description: An action to unlock the device. The payload is 'null' which indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

llm_td_lst.title: MQTT Smart Lock Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart lock device that can be controlled via MQTT protocol, allowing users to lock and unlock the device remotely through specific topics

lockState.title: Lock State
lockState.description: Represents the current state of the lock (locked/unlocked)

lockAction.title: Lock Action
lockAction.description: An action to lock the device. The payload being null suggests it's a trigger/action rather than setting a value.

unlockAction.title: Unlock action
unlockAction.description: This affordance represents the unlock action of a smart lock device. The topic 'lock/unlock' indicates that it's an action to unlock, and the null payload suggests it's a command trigger rather than a state update.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Radio Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart radio device that can be controlled remotely, allowing users to turn it on/off and switch between different channels.

radioPowerState.title: Radio Power
radioPowerState.description: The power state of the radio, which can be turned on or off.

radioChannel.title: Radio Channel
radioChannel.description: The available channels on the radio device. This property shows the current channel and allows switching between different radio stations.

powerOnAction.title: Power On Action
powerOnAction.description: An action to turn the radio on.

switchChannel.title: Switch Channel Action
switchChannel.description: An action to switch the radio channel. This action does not return any data, as indicated by the null payload.

powerOff.title: Power Off
powerOff.description: An action to turn off the radio.

llm_td_lst.title: Radio Device
llm_td_lst.description: A radio device that can be turned on/off and allows channel selection between MTV, Jamz, The Mix, and The Beat.

radioPowerState.title: Radio Power
radioPowerState.description: A property that represents the power state of the radio, which can be either on or off.

radioChannelSelection.title: Radio Channel Selection
radioChannelSelection.description: This affordance allows the user to select different radio channels.

powerOn.title: Power On Action
powerOn.description: Action to turn the radio on

switchChannel.title: Switch Channel
switchChannel.description: An action to switch the current channel of the radio.

powerOffAction.title: Power Off Action
powerOffAction.description: An action to turn off the radio device.

llm_td_lst.title: Internet Radio Device
llm_td_lst.description: A radio device that can be controlled via MQTT to switch between channels like MTV, Jamz, The Mix, and The Beat, and supports power on/off functionality.

radioChannelSelection.title: Radio Channel Selection
radioChannelSelection.description: This affordance allows the user to select and switch between different radio channels. It provides a list of available channel names such as MTV, Jamz, The Beat, and The Mix.

radioPowerControl.title: Radio Power Control
radioPowerControl.description: An action to turn the radio on or off.

powerOnAffordance.title: Power On Affordance
powerOnAffordance.description: This affordance represents the action to turn on the radio. It can be invoked by sending a message with a null payload.

switchChannel.title: Switch Channel
switchChannel.description: An action to switch the radio channel.

powerOff.title: Power Off
powerOff.description: An action to turn off the radio device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Radio Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart radio device that can be controlled remotely via MQTT. It allows turning the power on/off, selecting different channels like MTV, Jamz, The Mix, and The Beat.

radioPowerState.title: Radio Power State
radioPowerState.description: Represents the power state of the radio device, which can be either on or off.

channelSelection.title: Channel Selection
channelSelection.description: This affordance allows the user to select different radio channels.

powerOnAction.title: Power On Action
powerOnAction.description: This action allows to turn the radio on.

switchChannel.title: Switch Channel
switchChannel.description: An action to switch the radio channel

powerOffAction.title: Power Off Action
powerOffAction.description: This action turns off the radio device.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Radio Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart radio device that allows controlling power state and switching between different radio channels via MQTT protocol.

radioPower.title: Radio Power
radioPower.description: A property that indicates if the radio is turned on or off.

radioChannel.title: Radio Channel
radioChannel.description: The current channel of the radio. This property can be read to get the current channel and written to switch to a different channel.

powerOnAction.title: Power On
powerOnAction.description: An action to turn the radio on.

switchChannel.title: Switch Radio Channel
switchChannel.description: An action to switch the radio channel. This affordance allows users to change the current radio station.

powerOffAction.title: Power Off Action
powerOffAction.description: Turns the radio off by sending a power off command.

base_td.title: smart speaker
base_td.description: Smart speaker with a wireless internet connection

connection.title: Online Connection Status
connection.description: States whether the speaker is connected to the Internet or not. If False music can not be played and the speaker must first be reconnected to the network

playing.title: Speaker Active
playing.description: States whether the speaker is currently playing music or not

status.title: Speaker Status
status.description: Indicates if the speaker is currently switched on or off

reconnect.title: Reconnect Speaker
reconnect.description: Reconnects device with the internet, enabling music to be played if connection was lost

play.title: Start Playback
play.description: Starts playing music from the selected player

toggle.title: Toggle Power
toggle.description: Turn the speaker on of off

standby.title: Go To Standby
standby.description: Puts the device into standby, making it unavailable

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Speaker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart speaker device that can be controlled via MQTT protocol, featuring volume control, playback controls, and connection status monitoring.

isConnectedStatus.title: Speaker Connection Status
isConnectedStatus.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently connected to the network or system.

isPlaying.title: Is Playing Status
isPlaying.description: Represents the playing status of the speaker, indicating whether audio is currently being played or not.

speakerStatus.title: Speaker Status
speakerStatus.description: The operational status of the speaker, indicating whether it is currently active or not.

speakerVolume.title: Speaker Volume
speakerVolume.description: The volume level of the speaker, which can be read and set to different values.

reconnectSpeaker.title: Reconnect
reconnectSpeaker.description: An action to reconnect the speaker device.

pauseSpeaker.title: Pause Speaker
pauseSpeaker.description: Pauses the playback on the speaker. This action does not take any parameters.

toggleSpeaker.title: Toggle Speaker
toggleSpeaker.description: Toggles the state of the speaker (e.g., on/off)

speakerStandby.title: Standby
speakerStandby.description: Puts the speaker into standby mode.

changePlayer.title: Change Player
changePlayer.description: An action to change the current player on the speaker device

increaseVolume.title: Increase Volume
increaseVolume.description: An action to increase the volume of the speaker.

decreaseVolume.title: Decrease Volume
decreaseVolume.description: An action to decrease the volume of the speaker.

llm_td_lst.title: Speaker Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a smart speaker device with capabilities to control playback, volume, and connection status.

isConnected.title: Speaker Connection Status
isConnected.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently connected or not. This property can be read to check the connection status.

isPlaying.title: Speaker Play Status
isPlaying.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently playing audio or not. This property can be read to determine the current play state.

status.title: Speaker Status
status.description: The status of the speaker, indicating whether it is currently active or not.

speakerVolume.title: Speaker Volume Control
speakerVolume.description: This property represents the current volume level of the speaker. It allows reading and writing the volume value, which ranges from 0 to 100.

reconnectSpeakerDevice.title: Reconnect Speaker
reconnectSpeakerDevice.description: Action to reconnect the speaker device.

playAction.title: Play Action
playAction.description: An action to play media on the speaker. This is an interaction affordance that triggers a function to start playing audio.

pauseSpeaker.title: Pause Speaker
pauseSpeaker.description: Pauses the currently playing media on the speaker.

toggleSpeakerState.title: Toggle Speaker State
toggleSpeakerState.description: An action to toggle the speaker's state (e.g., on/off, play/pause)

speakerStandby.title: Speaker Standby
speakerStandby.description: An action to put the speaker into standby mode

changePlayer.title: Change Player
changePlayer.description: An action to change the current player on the speaker device.

increaseVolume.title: Increase Volume
increaseVolume.description: Increases the volume level of the speaker.

decreaseVolume.title: Decrease Volume
decreaseVolume.description: An action to decrease the volume of the speaker.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Speaker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart speaker with various controls and status indicators, including connection status, playback control, volume adjustment, and power management capabilities.

isConnected.title: Speaker Connection Status
isConnected.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently connected to the system.

isPlayingStatus.title: Speaker Is Playing Status
isPlayingStatus.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently playing audio or not.

speakerStatus.title: Speaker Status
speakerStatus.description: Represents the operational status of the speaker, indicating whether it is active or inactive.

speakerVolumeLevel.title: Speaker Volume Level
speakerVolumeLevel.description: The current volume level of the speaker, which can be read and modified.

reconnectSpeaker.title: Reconnect Speaker
reconnectSpeaker.description: An action to reconnect the speaker device, triggered by sending a null payload.

playAction.title: Play action
playAction.description: An action that triggers the speaker to start playing audio. The null payload indicates it's an action without parameters.

pauseSpeaker.title: Pause Speaker
pauseSpeaker.description: An action to pause the currently playing audio on the speaker.

toggleSpeakerState.title: Toggle Affordance
toggleSpeakerState.description: Toggles the state of the speaker (e.g., on/off). The 'null' payload indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

speakerStandby.title: Standby
speakerStandby.description: Puts the speaker into standby mode

changePlayer.title: Change Player
changePlayer.description: Action to change the current player on the speaker. This action takes no parameters, as indicated by the null payload.

increaseVolume.title: Increase Volume
increaseVolume.description: An action to increase the volume of the speaker.

decreaseVolume.title: Decrease Volume
decreaseVolume.description: An action to decrease the volume of the speaker.

llm_td_lst.title: Speaker Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a speaker device with various properties and actions related to its operation, including connection status, playback control, volume adjustment, and power management.

isConnectedStatus.title: Speaker Connection Status
isConnectedStatus.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently connected to a power source or network.

isPlaying.title: Speaker Playing Status
isPlaying.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently playing audio or not.

speakerStatus.title: Speaker Status
speakerStatus.description: Represents the current operational status of the speaker (on/off)

speakerVolume.title: Speaker Volume
speakerVolume.description: The current volume level of the speaker, which can be read and updated.

reconnectSpeaker.title: Reconnect Action
reconnectSpeaker.description: Action to reconnect the speaker device

pausePlayback.title: Pause playback
pausePlayback.description: Pauses the current playback on the speaker.

toggleSpeakerState.title: Toggle Speaker State
toggleSpeakerState.description: Toggles the state of the speaker. This action allows to switch between different states, such as on/off or play/pause.

speakerStandby.title: Standby
speakerStandby.description: Puts the speaker into standby mode.

changePlayer.title: Change Player
changePlayer.description: An action to change the current player on the speaker device. This action does not require any input parameters as indicated by the null payload.

increaseVolume.title: Increase Volume
increaseVolume.description: An action to increase the volume of the speaker.

decreaseVolume.title: Decrease Volume
decreaseVolume.description: An action to decrease the volume of the speaker by one step.

llm_td_lst.title: Speaker Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart speaker device with network connectivity and audio playback capabilities, featuring volume control, play/pause functionality, and various connection states.

isConnectedStatus.title: Speaker Connection Status
isConnectedStatus.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently connected to a network or source device.

isPlaying.title: Speaker Play Status
isPlaying.description: Indicates whether the speaker is currently playing audio or not

speakerStatus.title: Speaker Status
speakerStatus.description: Represents the current status state of the speaker device, indicating whether it is active or inactive.

volumeLevel.title: Speaker Volume
volumeLevel.description: The volume level of the speaker, represented as an integer between 0 and 100.

reconnectSpeaker.title: Reconnect Affordance
reconnectSpeaker.description: An action to reconnect the speaker device.

playAction.title: Play Action
playAction.description: An action to start playing audio on the speaker.

speakerPause.title: Pause Speaker
speakerPause.description: Pauses the playback on the speaker device

speakerStandby.title: Standby
speakerStandby.description: Puts the speaker into standby mode

changePlayer.title: Change Player
changePlayer.description: Action to change the currently active player on the speaker.

increaseVolume.title: Increase Volume
increaseVolume.description: An action to increase the volume of the speaker by a single step.

decreaseVolume.title: Decrease Volume
decreaseVolume.description: An action to decrease the volume of the speaker.

base_td.title: Smart TV
base_td.description: A smart Television with recording capabilities

recording.title: Recording Enabled
recording.description: True if the TV is currently recording the selected channel

off.title: TV Off
off.description: Indicates if the TV is turned off(True) or turned on (False)

brightness.title: Brightness Level
brightness.description: Describes brightness of the TV screen in percent

channel.title: Current Channel
channel.description: States the currently selected channel that will be displayed if the device is turned on

set brightness.title: Set Brightness Level
set brightness.description: Sets the brightness of the tv.
