llm_td_lst.title: Smart TV Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart television device with capabilities to record content, adjust brightness, switch channels, and control power state.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently recording or not. This property reflects a boolean state that can be read to determine if recording is active.

isOff.title: TV Power State
isOff.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently powered off or not

brightnessLevel.title: Brightness Level
brightnessLevel.description: The current brightness level of the TV, ranging from 0 to 100.

channelSelectionProperty.title: Channel Selection
channelSelectionProperty.description: The channel selection property allows reading and writing the current TV channel. It can be set to one of several predefined channels.

recordTV.title: Record TV
recordTV.description: This affordance allows the user to record content on the TV. The action is invoked by sending a message with a null payload, which indicates that no additional parameters are required.

switchTV.title: Switch TV
switchTV.description: An action to switch the TV on or off. The payload is always null, indicating that it's a trigger without additional parameters.

turnOnTV.title: Turn On TV
turnOnTV.description: An action to turn the TV on.

turnOffTV.title: Turn Off TV
turnOffTV.description: An action to turn off the TV device.

setBrightness.title: Set TV Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to set the brightness level of the TV, which manipulates its state.

llm_td_lst.title: TV Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a TV device with various properties and actions, including recording status, power state, brightness control, channel selection, and interaction affordances for switching the TV on/off and setting brightness levels.

isRecordingStatus.title: Is Recording Status
isRecordingStatus.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently recording or not. This property reflects the current state of the recording functionality.

isOff.title: Is TV Off
isOff.description: Represents the state whether the TV is turned off or not.

brightness.title: TV Brightness
brightness.description: The brightness level of the TV, which can be read and updated.

channel.title: Channel Selection
channel.description: The current channel being displayed on the TV. This property can be read to determine the currently selected channel and written to change the channel.

record.title: Record
record.description: An action to start recording on the TV device.

switchTV.title: Switch TV
switchTV.description: An action to switch the TV on or off.

turnOnTV.title: Turn On TV
turnOnTV.description: An action to turn on the TV. The payload is always null, indicating that no additional data needs to be provided for this action.

turnOffTV.title: Turn Off TV
turnOffTV.description: An action to turn off the TV. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: Sets the brightness level of the TV

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Television Device
llm_td_lst.description: A smart television device that can be controlled remotely, offering features like recording, brightness adjustment, channel selection, and power management.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently recording or not. This is a property that reflects the current state of the TV's recording functionality.

isOffStatus.title: Is Off Status
isOffStatus.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently turned off or not. This property reflects the current state of the TV's power status.

tvBrightness.title: TV Brightness
tvBrightness.description: The current brightness level of the TV, which can be read and updated.

channelSelection.title: Channel Selection
channelSelection.description: This affordance allows the TV to switch between different channels. The channel can be set by sending a string value representing the desired channel name.

recordAction.title: Record Action
recordAction.description: An action to start recording on the TV device. The payload is always null, indicating that no additional parameters are required for this action.

switchTVState.title: Switch TV State
switchTVState.description: An action that allows the user to switch the TV's state (on/off). The action takes no input parameters and returns no output, as indicated by the null payload.

turnOn.title: Turn On Television
turnOn.description: An action to turn on the television. This is an action because it manipulates state by turning the device on.

turnOffTV.title: Turn Off TV
turnOffTV.description: Action to turn off the television by sending a null value to the 'turn_off' topic.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to set the brightness level of the TV. The brightness can be adjusted by sending a numeric value between 0 and 100.

llm_td_lst.title: TV Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a TV device with various properties and actions including recording, power control, brightness adjustment, and channel selection.

isRecording.title: isRecording
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently recording.

isOff.title: TV Power Status
isOff.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently powered off.

brightnessLevel.title: Brightness Level
brightnessLevel.description: The current brightness level of the TV, ranging from 0 to 100.

channel.title: Channel Selection
channel.description: The channel property allows reading and writing the current TV channel. It can be set to one of several predefined channels.

recordFunction.title: Record Function
recordFunction.description: An action to start recording on the TV device. The function takes no parameters as indicated by the null payload.

tvSwitch.title: TV Switch
tvSwitch.description: An action to switch the TV on or off.

turnOnTV.title: Turn On TV
turnOnTV.description: Action to turn on the TV device.

turnOffTV.title: Turn Off TV
turnOffTV.description: An action to turn off the TV. This is an interaction that changes the state of the device.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: This action changes the brightness level of the TV to a specified value.

llm_td_lst.title: TV Device
llm_td_lst.description: This Thing Description models a TV device with capabilities to control recording, power state, brightness level, and channel selection.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently recording or not.

isOff.title: TV Power State
isOff.description: Indicates whether the TV is currently turned off or not. This property can be read to determine if the TV is in an off state.

tvBrightnessLevel.title: TV Brightness Level
tvBrightnessLevel.description: The current brightness level of the TV, which can be read and updated.

channelSelection.title: Channel Selection
channelSelection.description: This affordance represents the current TV channel being displayed. It exposes a list of possible channels that can be selected.

recordTV.title: Record TV
recordTV.description: Action to start recording on the TV.

switchTV.title: Switch TV
switchTV.description: An action to switch the TV on or off.

turnOnTV.title: Turn on TV
turnOnTV.description: An action to turn the TV on.

turnOffTV.title: Turn Off TV
turnOffTV.description: An action to turn off the TV. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing, which manipulates its state by turning it off.

setBrightness.title: Set Brightness
setBrightness.description: An action to set the brightness level of the TV. This allows users or other systems to adjust the display's illumination.

base_td.title: Sprinkler
base_td.description: A sprinkler for watering plants with an external water tank

water.title: Water Reservoir Status
water.description: States whether the water tank is full or empty. If True water is still remaining in the tank and the device is ready for usage otherwise water needs to be refilled

on.title: Sprinkler On/Off Status
on.description: Describes whether the device is turned on (if True) or off (if False)

Power on.title: Power On Sprinkler
Power on.description: Turns power of the watering system on

Power off.title: Power Off Sprinkler
Power off.description: Turns power of the watering system off

Sprinkle.title: Start Sprinkling
Sprinkle.description: Initiates watering process wetting all surrounding plants

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Watering System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart watering system that can be controlled remotely to water plants, with features for checking water availability and system status.

hasWater.title: Water Availability Status
hasWater.description: Indicates whether the watering system currently has water available.

wateringSystemOnState.title: Watering System On State
wateringSystemOnState.description: Represents the current on/off state of the watering system. This property can be read to determine if the system is currently active or not.

powerOn.title: Power On Action
powerOn.description: Action to power on the watering system.

powerOff.title: Power Off Affordance
powerOff.description: An action to turn off the power of the watering system.

sprinkleWateringSystem.title: Sprinkle Water
sprinkleWateringSystem.description: An action to sprinkle water using the watering system.

refillWateringSystem.title: Refill the Watering System
refillWateringSystem.description: An action to refill the watering system with water.

llm_td_lst.title: Watering System Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart watering system controller that manages water availability, power states, and various watering actions through MQTT communication.

hasWaterStatus.title: Water Availability Status
hasWaterStatus.description: Indicates whether the watering system currently has water available.

wateringSystemOnState.title: Watering System On State
wateringSystemOnState.description: Represents the on/off state of the watering system. This property can be read and written to toggle the system's power.

powerOn.title: Power On Affordance
powerOn.description: An action to power on the watering system.

powerOff.title: Power Off Action
powerOff.description: Turns off the power of the watering system.

sprinkleWateringSystem.title: Sprinkle Action
sprinkleWateringSystem.description: Triggers the sprinkler system to start watering

refillWaterSystem.title: Refill Water System
refillWaterSystem.description: An action to refill the water system

llm_td_lst.title: Automated Watering System
llm_td_lst.description: A smart watering system that can be controlled remotely to manage water distribution for plants or gardens. It includes features for monitoring water availability, controlling power states, and performing various watering actions.

hasWaterStatus.title: Water Availability Status
hasWaterStatus.description: Indicates whether the water system has water available.

wateringSystemOnState.title: Watering System On State
wateringSystemOnState.description: A property that indicates whether the watering system is currently turned on or off.

powerOnAffordance.title: Power On Affordance
powerOnAffordance.description: An action that turns the watering system on.

powerOff.title: Power Off
powerOff.description: An action to turn off the power of the watering system. It's an interaction that triggers a process on the Thing.

sprinkleAction.title: Sprinkle Action
sprinkleAction.description: An action to sprinkle water from the watering system. The payload being null indicates that it's a trigger without any parameters.

refill.title: Refill Water
refill.description: Action to refill the water in the system

llm_td_lst.title: Watering System Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart watering system that controls water distribution, monitors water availability, and allows remote control of various watering functions.

hasWaterStatus.title: Water Availability Status
hasWaterStatus.description: Indicates whether the watering system currently has water available.

wateringSystemOnStatus.title: Watering System On Status
wateringSystemOnStatus.description: Represents the on/off state of the watering system. It can be read to get the current status and written to change it.

powerOn.title: Power On
powerOn.description: An action to turn on the power for the watering system

powerOff.title: Power Off
powerOff.description: Turns off the power to the watering system

sprinkleWateringSystem.title: Sprinkle Action
sprinkleWateringSystem.description: Action to sprinkle water from the watering system

refillWateringSystem.title: Refill Watering System
refillWateringSystem.description: This action triggers the refill process for the watering system.

llm_td_lst.title: Automatic Watering System Controller
llm_td_lst.description: An automated watering system that controls water distribution for plants, featuring status monitoring and various control actions like power on/off, sprinkling, and refilling.

hasWaterStatus.title: Water Availability Status
hasWaterStatus.description: Indicates whether the watering system currently has water available.

wateringSystemOnStatus.title: Watering System On Status
wateringSystemOnStatus.description: Represents the on/off status of the watering system.

powerOn.title: Power On
powerOn.description: An action to turn on the power of the watering system.

powerOff.title: Power Off Affordance
powerOff.description: This action affordance allows the user to turn off the power of the watering system.

sprinkleAction.title: Sprinkle Action
sprinkleAction.description: An action to sprinkle water from the watering system

refillWaterSystem.title: Refill Watering System
refillWaterSystem.description: An action to refill the water in the system

base_td.title: Stove
base_td.description: A two plate electric stove

plate_1_power.title: Plate 1 Power Status
plate_1_power.description: Indicates whether plate 1 is currently turned on or off

plate_2_power.title: Plate 2 Power Status
plate_2_power.description: Indicates whether plate 2 is currently turned on or off

plate_1_level.title: Plate 1 Power Level
plate_1_level.description: Represents the current heating level of plate 1

plate_2_level.title: Plate 2 Power Level
plate_2_level.description: Represents the current heating level of plate 2

activate_plate_1.title: Activate Plate 1
activate_plate_1.description: Activates plate 1 setting its power level to True

activate_plate_2.title: Activate Plate 2
activate_plate_2.description: Activates plate 2 setting its power level to True

deactivate_plate_1.title: Deactivate Plate 1
deactivate_plate_1.description: Deactivates plate 1 setting its power level to False

deactivate_plate_2.title: Deactivate Plate 2
deactivate_plate_2.description: Deactivates plate 2 setting its power level to False

increase_heat_plate_1.title: Increase Heat Plate 1
increase_heat_plate_1.description: Increases the heating level for plate 1 by 1

increase_heat_plate_2.title: Increase Heat Plate 2
increase_heat_plate_2.description: Increases the heating level for plate 2 by 1

decrease_heat_plate_1.title: Decrease Heat Plate 1
decrease_heat_plate_1.description: Increases the heating level for plate 1 by 1

decrease_heat_plate_2.title: Decrease Heat Plate 2
decrease_heat_plate_2.description: Increases the heating level for plate 2 by 1

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Stove with Two Plates
llm_td_lst.description: A smart stove with two independently controllable plates, featuring heat level adjustment and on/off controls for each plate.

plate1PowerState.title: Plate 1 Power State
plate1PowerState.description: Represents the on/off state of plate 1 on the stove.

plate2PowerStatus.title: Plate 2 Power Status
plate2PowerStatus.description: Represents the power status of plate 2 on the stove. This can be either true (powered on) or false (powered off).

plate_1_level.title: Plate 1 Level
plate_1_level.description: The current heat level setting for plate 1 on the stove.

plate2Level.title: Stove Plate 2 Level
plate2Level.description: The current heat level setting for the second plate on the stove. Values range from 0 to 7.

activatePlate1.title: Activate Plate 1
activatePlate1.description: An action to activate plate 1 on the stove. This is an interaction that triggers a process or changes the state of the stove.

activatePlate2.title: Activate Plate 2
activatePlate2.description: An action to activate plate 2 on the stove. This action does not require any input parameters as indicated by the null payload.

deactivatePlate1.title: Deactivate Plate 1
deactivatePlate1.description: This action affordance allows the user to deactivate plate 1 on the stove.

deactivatePlate2.title: Deactivate Plate 2
deactivatePlate2.description: An action to deactivate plate 2 on the stove. This affordance manipulates the state of the stove by turning off plate 2.

increaseHeatPlate1.title: Increase Heat Plate 1
increaseHeatPlate1.description: An action to increase the heat level of plate 1 on the stove.

increaseHeatPlate2.title: Increase Heat Plate 2
increaseHeatPlate2.description: Action to increase the heat level on plate 2 of the stove.

decreaseHeatPlate1.title: Decrease Heat Plate 1
decreaseHeatPlate1.description: An action to decrease the heat level of plate 1 on the stove.

decreaseHeatPlate2.title: Decrease Heat Plate 2
decreaseHeatPlate2.description: An action to decrease the heat level of plate 2 on the stove.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Stove Controller
llm_td_lst.description: A smart stove controller that manages the power states and heat levels of two cooking plates, allowing for remote activation, deactivation, and temperature control through various actions.

plate1PowerState.title: Plate 1 Power State
plate1PowerState.description: Represents the power state of plate 1 on the stove, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

plate2PowerStatus.title: Plate 2 Power Status
plate2PowerStatus.description: Represents the power status (on/off) of plate 2 on the stove.

plate_1_level.title: Plate 1 Level
plate_1_level.description: The current heat level setting for plate 1 on the stove.

plate2Level.title: Plate 2 Level
plate2Level.description: The level setting for plate 2 on the stove, which can be adjusted to different values.

activatePlate1.title: Activate Plate 1
activatePlate1.description: An action to activate the first plate on the stove. This action triggers a process on the Thing.

activatePlate2.title: Activate Plate 2
activatePlate2.description: Activates the second plate on the stove by sending a null payload. This action triggers the activation process for plate 2.

deactivatePlate1.title: Deactivate Plate 1
deactivatePlate1.description: An action to deactivate plate 1 on the stove.

deactivatePlate2.title: Deactivate Plate 2
deactivatePlate2.description: An action to deactivate plate 2 on the stove

increaseHeatPlate1.description: An action to increase the heat level of plate 1 on the stove

increaseHeatPlate2.title: Increase Heat Plate 2
increaseHeatPlate2.description: An action to increase the heat level of plate 2 on the stove.

decreaseHeatPlate1.description: An action to decrease the heat level of plate 1 on the stove.

decreaseHeatPlate2.title: Decrease Heat Plate 2
decreaseHeatPlate2.description: An action to decrease the heat level of plate 2 on the stove.

llm_td_lst.title: Streaming Drone Device
llm_td_lst.description: A classification of a drone that supports video streaming and recording capabilities, with features like battery level monitoring and recharge functionality.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently recording.

isStreaming.title: Is Streaming
isStreaming.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently streaming or not.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the streaming drone, ranging from 0 to 100.

startStreaming.title: Stream Affordance
startStreaming.description: An action that triggers the drone to start streaming video.

stopStreamAction.title: Stop Streaming Action
stopStreamAction.description: An action to stop the current video stream on the drone.

recordAction.title: Record Action
recordAction.description: An action to start recording on the drone. The null payload indicates that no additional data is needed for this action.

endRecordingStream.title: End Recording Stream
endRecordingStream.description: An action to end the current recording or streaming session on the drone.

rechargeDrone.title: Recharge the Drone
rechargeDrone.description: An action to recharge the drone's battery.

llm_td_lst.title: Drone Camera System
llm_td_lst.description: A drone equipped with a camera system that supports streaming and recording capabilities, along with battery management features.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the drone's recording feature is currently active or not.

isStreaming.title: Is Streaming
isStreaming.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently streaming or not.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: Represents the current battery level of the drone as a percentage value between 0 and 100.

streamAffordance.title: Stream Affordance
streamAffordance.description: An action that starts the video stream from the drone camera.

stopStream.title: Stop Stream Action
stopStream.description: An action to stop the current stream on the drone. This action takes no parameters and always returns null.

startRecording.title: Start Recording
startRecording.description: Triggers the start of recording on the drone. The action takes no parameters and returns nothing.

endRecording.title: End Recording
endRecording.description: An action to end the current recording session on the drone.

rechargeDrone.title: Recharge
rechargeDrone.description: An action to trigger the drone's recharge process.

llm_td_lst.title: Streaming Drone Device
llm_td_lst.description: A drone capable of streaming and recording video, with battery management capabilities. It can be controlled via MQTT messages to start/stop streaming and recording, check battery status, and initiate recharging.

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently recording or not. This property can be observed to track the recording state.

isStreaming.title: Streaming Status
isStreaming.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently streaming or not. This property can be read to check if streaming is active.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the drone, represented as a percentage value between 0 and 100.

streamAffordance.title: Stream Affordance
streamAffordance.description: An action to start streaming from the drone.

stopStream.title: Stop Stream
stopStream.description: Action to stop the current stream on the drone.

recordAction.title: Record Action
recordAction.description: An action to start recording on the drone. This action takes no parameters and returns no value, hence the null payload.

endStream.title: End Streaming
endStream.description: An action to end the current streaming session on the drone.

rechargeDrone.title: Recharge
rechargeDrone.description: An action to initiate the drone's recharging process.

llm_td_lst.title: Streaming Drone Device
llm_td_lst.description: A drone capable of video streaming, recording, and battery management

isRecording.title: Recording Status
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the drone's recording functionality is currently active or inactive.

isStreaming.title: Is Streaming Status
isStreaming.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently streaming video or not. This is a boolean property that can be read to determine the current streaming state.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: Represents the current battery level of the drone as a percentage value between 0 and 100.

streamAffordance.title: Stream Affordance
streamAffordance.description: An action to initiate video streaming from the drone.

stopStream.title: Stop Stream
stopStream.description: This action stops the current stream on the drone.

recordAction.title: Record Action
recordAction.description: An action to start recording on the drone. The payload is null, indicating that it's a trigger without any parameters.

endStream.title: End Stream
endStream.description: An action to end the current stream session on the drone.

rechargeDrone.title: Recharge Drone
rechargeDrone.description: Triggers the drone to start recharging its battery.

llm_td_lst.title: Drone Device
llm_td_lst.description: A streaming drone with recording capabilities, battery management and MQTT connectivity

isRecording.title: Is Recording
isRecording.description: Indicates whether the drone is currently recording or not.

isStreaming.title: Is Streaming
isStreaming.description: Indicates whether the drone's streaming functionality is currently active.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the drone, measured as a percentage.

streamAffordance.title: Stream Affordance
streamAffordance.description: An action to start the stream on the drone.

stopStream.title: Stop Streaming
stopStream.description: An action to stop the streaming functionality of the drone.

startRecording.title: Record Action
startRecording.description: Starts the recording process on the drone.

endRecording.title: End Recording
endRecording.description: An action to end the current recording session on the drone.

rechargeAction.title: Recharge Affordance
rechargeAction.description: An action to trigger the recharging process of the drone's battery.

base_td.title: Vacuum robot
base_td.description: A vacuum roboter for cleaning the floor

cleaning.title: Current Cleaning Status
cleaning.description: States if the robot is currently cleaning or not

storage_full.title: Waste Bin Level
storage_full.description: States whether the storage of the robot is full or not

battery.title: Battery Level
battery.description: Describes the current power charge in percent

mapped.title: Room Mapping Available
mapped.description: States whether a current mapping of the room is available, needed in order to start the vacuuming

at_base.title: Robot Base Status
at_base.description: States whether the robot is currently docked at the charging base station

start.title: Start Cleaning Cycle
start.description: Starts vacuuming the room, only valid if a mapping for the room and sufficient storage and battery are available

return_to_base.title: Return To Base
return_to_base.description: Returns to the base, enables further actions

topic: vacuum/is_cleaning; payload: true; retain: false

topic: vacuum/is_cleaning; payload: false; retain: false

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart robot vacuum cleaner with cleaning, mapping, and charging capabilities.

isCleaning.title: Is Cleaning
isCleaning.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently cleaning or not.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's storage container is full or not.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner as a percentage value.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: Indicates whether the vacuum has completed its mapping process.

isAtBase.title: Is at base
isAtBase.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently docked at its charging base.

startCleaning.title: Start Cleaning
startCleaning.description: Triggers the vacuum cleaner to start cleaning. This action does not return any data and is represented by a null payload.

vacuumScanAction.title: Scan Affordance
vacuumScanAction.description: An action to trigger the scanning functionality of the vacuum cleaner.

emptyStorage.title: Empty Storage Action
emptyStorage.description: An action to empty the vacuum's storage bin.

returnToBase.title: Base command
returnToBase.description: Command to send the vacuum cleaner back to its base station for charging.

chargeVacuumRobot.title: Charge the Vacuum Robot
chargeVacuumRobot.description: This action triggers the robot to return to its charging base and start charging.

llm_td_lst.title: Vacuum Cleaner Robot
llm_td_lst.description: A robot vacuum cleaner with features like cleaning, scanning, charging, and storage management.

isCleaning.title: Is Cleaning
isCleaning.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently cleaning.

storageFull.title: Storage Full Status
storageFull.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's storage container is full.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner, measured as a percentage.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: Indicates whether the vacuum has completed mapping of its environment.

isAtBase.title: Is At Base
isAtBase.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently at its charging base.

startVacuumCleaning.title: Start Vacuum Cleaning
startVacuumCleaning.description: An action to start the vacuum cleaning process. This affordance allows users to initiate a cleaning cycle.

scanVacuum.title: Scan
scanVacuum.description: Triggers the vacuum to perform a scan operation

emptyStorage.title: Empty Storage
emptyStorage.description: An action to empty the storage of the vacuum cleaner.

baseAffordance.title: Base Affordance
baseAffordance.description: This affordance allows to send the robot vacuum to its charging base.

vacuumCharge.title: Charge the Vacuum Cleaner
vacuumCharge.description: This action triggers the vacuum cleaner to return to its charging base and start charging.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Robot Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart robot vacuum cleaner that can perform autonomous cleaning, mapping, and charging operations. It features various sensors to monitor its status and can be controlled remotely through MQTT commands.

isCleaningStatus.title: Is Cleaning Status
isCleaningStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently cleaning or not. This property can be read to check the current state and may also be observable if the Thing pushes updates when the state changes.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's storage is full or not. This property can be read to determine if the device needs maintenance.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner, represented as a percentage value.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: Indicates whether the vacuum has a map of its environment.

isAtBase.title: Is At Base
isAtBase.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently at its base station.

startCleaning.title: Start Cleaning
startCleaning.description: Triggers the vacuum to start cleaning

scanAffordance.title: Scan Affordance
scanAffordance.description: Triggers the vacuum to perform a scan operation. This action initiates the scanning process.

emptyStorage.title: Empty Storage Command
emptyStorage.description: An action to empty the storage of the vacuum cleaner.

base.title: Base Command
base.description: Command to send the vacuum cleaner back to its base station for charging and storage.

vacuumCharge.title: Charge the Vacuum
vacuumCharge.description: An action that triggers the vacuum to return to its charging base and begin charging.

llm_td_lst.title: Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with cleaning, mapping, and charging capabilities.

isCleaning.title: Is Cleaning
isCleaning.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently cleaning or not.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's storage (dustbin) is full or not. This property can be read to check the current status.

vacuumBatteryLevel.title: Battery Level
vacuumBatteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner, represented as a percentage value between 0 and 100.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: Represents whether the vacuum has a valid map available for navigation.

isAtBase.title: Is At Base
isAtBase.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently at its charging base.

startCleaning.title: Start Cleaning
startCleaning.description: An action to start the cleaning process of the vacuum cleaner.

scanVacuum.title: Scan
scanVacuum.description: An action to trigger the scanning process on the vacuum device.

emptyStorage.title: Empty Storage
emptyStorage.description: An action to empty the storage of the vacuum cleaner.

baseAffordance.title: Base Affordance
baseAffordance.description: An action to send the vacuum cleaner back to its charging base.

chargeCommand.title: Charge Command
chargeCommand.description: Triggers the robot to charge at its base station.

llm_td_lst.title: Smart Vacuum Cleaner
llm_td_lst.description: A smart vacuum cleaner with IoT capabilities that can be controlled remotely through MQTT messages. It features properties for monitoring cleaning status, battery level, storage fullness, and mapping completion. The device supports various actions such as starting the cleaning process, scanning the environment, emptying the dustbin, returning to base, and charging.

isCleaning.title: Is Cleaning
isCleaning.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently cleaning.

storageFullStatus.title: Storage Full Status
storageFullStatus.description: Indicates whether the vacuum's storage (dustbin) is full or not. This property can be read to check if the dustbin needs emptying.

batteryLevel.title: Battery Level
batteryLevel.description: The current battery level of the vacuum cleaner, reported as a percentage value between 0 and 100.

isMapped.title: Is Mapped
isMapped.description: Indicates whether the robot has completed its map of the environment.

isAtBase.title: Vacuum Is At Base
isAtBase.description: Indicates whether the vacuum cleaner is currently at its charging base.

startCleaning.title: Start Cleaning
startCleaning.description: An action to start the cleaning process of the vacuum cleaner.

scan.title: Scan
scan.description: An action to trigger the scanning functionality of the vacuum cleaner.

emptyStorage.title: Empty Storage
emptyStorage.description: An action that triggers the emptying of the storage container in the vacuum cleaner.

base.title: Base Command
base.description: Command to send the vacuum cleaner back to its charging base

chargeVacuum.title: Charge the Vacuum
chargeVacuum.description: An action to charge the vacuum cleaner. It does not take any parameters and simply triggers the charging process.

base_td.title: Ventilator
base_td.description: A ventilator with three different intensity levels

status.title: Ventilator Operating Mode
status.description: Displays the current status of the device

level.title: Fan Speed Level
level.description: Displays the current fan speed level

llm_td_lst.title: Hospital Ventilator Device
llm_td_lst.description: A medical ventilator that provides respiratory support. It can be turned on/off, has adjustable ventilation levels, and supports various control actions.

ventilatorStatus.title: Ventilator Status
ventilatorStatus.description: Represents the current status of the ventilator, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

ventilatorLevel.title: Ventilator Level
ventilatorLevel.description: The current level setting of the ventilator, which can be read and updated.

startVentilation.title: Start Ventilation
startVentilation.description: Action to start the ventilation process

ventilatorStop.title: Stop Ventilator
ventilatorStop.description: An action to stop the ventilation process.

ventilatorUpAction.title: Ventilator Up Action
ventilatorUpAction.description: An action to increase the ventilation level.

decreaseVentilationLevel.title: Decrease Ventilation Level
decreaseVentilationLevel.description: An action to decrease the ventilation level of the device.

llm_td_lst.title: Medical Ventilator Control System
llm_td_lst.description: A medical ventilator control system that allows monitoring and controlling ventilation levels and status through MQTT communication protocol.

ventilatorStatus.title: Ventilator Status
ventilatorStatus.description: Represents the current status of the ventilator, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

ventilatorLevel.title: Ventilator Level
ventilatorLevel.description: The current level setting of the ventilator, which can be read and updated.

startVentilator.title: Start Ventilator
startVentilator.description: An action to start the ventilator. This is an interaction affordance that allows invoking a function on the Thing.

ventilatorStop.title: Stop Ventilator
ventilatorStop.description: An action to stop the ventilator's operation.

increaseVentilationLevel.title: Increase Ventilation Level
increaseVentilationLevel.description: An action to increase the ventilation level by one step.

ventilatorDown.title: Ventilator Down Control
ventilatorDown.description: Action to decrease the ventilation level

llm_td_lst.title: Ventilator Control System
llm_td_lst.description: A ventilation system that can be controlled to adjust its operational state and level settings.

ventilatorStatus.title: Ventilator Status
ventilatorStatus.description: The current operational state of the ventilator, either 'on' or 'off'. This property reflects whether the device is actively running.

ventilatorLevel.title: Ventilation Level
ventilatorLevel.description: The current level setting of the ventilation system, which can be read and updated.

startVentilator.title: Start Action
startVentilator.description: Action to start the ventilator. This action does not take any parameters and simply triggers the start process.

ventilatorStop.title: Stop Ventilation
ventilatorStop.description: An action to stop the ventilation process.

ventilatorUp.title: Ventilator Up Action
ventilatorUp.description: Action to increase the ventilation level

ventilatorDown.title: Ventilator Down Action
ventilatorDown.description: Decreases the ventilation level by one step.

llm_td_lst.title: Medical Ventilator Device
llm_td_lst.description: A medical ventilation device that controls breathing assistance through various actions such as starting, stopping, and adjusting ventilation levels.

ventilatorStatus.title: Ventilator Status
ventilatorStatus.description: The current status of the ventilator, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

ventilatorLevel.title: Ventilator Level
ventilatorLevel.description: The current level setting of the ventilator, which can be read and potentially written to adjust its operation.

startVentilation.title: Start Ventilator
startVentilation.description: An action to start the ventilation process.

ventilatorStop.title: Stop Ventilator
ventilatorStop.description: Stops the ventilation process by sending a stop command to the device.

increaseVentilationLevel.title: Increase Ventilation Level
increaseVentilationLevel.description: An action to increase the ventilation level by one step.

ventilatorDownAction.title: Ventilator Down Action
ventilatorDownAction.description: An action to decrease the ventilation level

llm_td_lst.title: Hospital Ventilator System
llm_td_lst.description: A medical ventilator system that can be controlled and monitored remotely. It supports operations such as starting, stopping, and adjusting ventilation levels through MQTT communication.

ventilatorStatus.title: Ventilator Status
ventilatorStatus.description: The current state of the ventilator, indicating whether it is turned on or off.

ventilatorLevel.title: Ventilator Level
ventilatorLevel.description: The current level setting of the ventilator, represented as a numerical value.

startVentilator.title: Start Ventilator
startVentilator.description: An action to start the ventilator. The 'null' payload indicates that no additional data is required for this action.

ventilatorStop.title: Stop Ventilator
ventilatorStop.description: An action to stop the ventilation process.

ventilatorUpAction.title: Ventilator Up Action
ventilatorUpAction.description: An action to increase the ventilation level. The 'up' command triggers an increment in the current ventilator level.

ventilatorDown.title: Ventilator Down Action
ventilatorDown.description: An action to decrease the ventilation level
